This business is something that he knows best, and he would like to ask for a loan to sustain his business and make improvements. His loan request will be used to purchase crab traps, fishing hooks and gasoline for his boat. 
His income will provide a nutritious diet for his family and pay school fees and the family’s electric bill. 
Any additional income will be reinvested for the same business and savings.

loans.use: to purchase crab traps, fishing hooks and gasoline

loans.name: Adoracion

texts.en: Adoracion is 42 years old, and is married to Clemente. The couple is thankful because they had been blessed with three children. Adoracion has been running her sari-sari store business for almost three years and earns about PHP 300 a day. Adoracion is a kind and energetic mother. She will do everything to lift up her family from poor living. Adoracion wants to re-stock her sari-sari store. To make it possible, Adoracion needs financial assistance. Therefore, Adoracion is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 25,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, candies, curls, and soft-drinks to sell in her general store.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, candies, curls, and soft-drinks to sell

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with two children.

To earn a living, Edgar has a tailoring shop, where he makes and sells sports attire and school and office uniforms. He has operated this business for eight years.

He requested a loan in the amount of 5,000 PHP to buy additional textiles for his tailoring work. Edgar is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Edgar hopes to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional textiles to make sports attire and school and office uniforms.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 55 years old, married to Julio, and lives in Isabela. They are blessed with three children: Julie, Julio, and Janica.

Rosario explains that her grocery store is situated in an urban area, where there are many customers, especially during school days because many high school and college students come to her store.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more and varied food items (e.g., snack foods, canned foods, and spices) to sell in the canteen. She expects that the loan proceeds will allow her to bring in more customers and to thereby generate more sales. She dreams of becoming a successful businesswoman so that she will be able to give her children a good future, which is why she works so hard. In the future, she hopes to open a grocery store next to her canteen.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory (snack foods, canned goods, and spices) for her store

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
Crispina is 70 years old, married, and lives in the Philippines.

To earn a living, Crispina has a tailoring business, where she makes and sells school and office uniforms. She has operated this business for nine years.

She requested a loan in the amount of 5,000 PHP to buy more textiles in making school and office uniforms. Crispina is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Crispina hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional textiles for making school and office uniforms

loans.name: Khoul

texts.en:
Khoul is a resident of Baray district, Kompong Tom province. She is 41 years old, married, and has three children. Two of her children are still attending school.

To earn a living, Khoul has been operating a farming business. Specifically, she grows rice, beans, potatoes, and vegetables for sale. She can earn approximately 17,700 KHR per day through her business. Khoul is thankful that she has a supportive husband who assists her in managing their business.

To improve her farming business and to obtain a fruitful harvest, Khoul would like to borrow some funds to rent laborers (to transplant rice) and to purchase bean seeds (for planting). Khoul hopes that the loan proceeds will enable her to increase her productivity and to yield more crops than in the previous years.

loans.use: to rent laborers for transplanting rice and to purchase bean seeds for planting.

loans.name: Gerocil

texts.en:
This is Gerocil, who is 26 years old and a resident of Caloocan City, Philippines. She is married to Efren, a businessman, and she is a mother to her child. She manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Gerocil operates a poultry supply store, where she sells different supplies, mostly for cocks. She sells it by kilo, and her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 25,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy more feeds and other supplies needed to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Gerocil hopes to grow her business and dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of their work.  It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stocks of supplies and products needed in her business

loans.name: Ndiang Bambodj Mousdalipha Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Ndiang Mbambodj Mousdalipha existe depuis le 27 décembre 2010;le groupe PC 02 est composé de 22 femmes qui sont issues du même quartier, elles sont parentes et leur activité principale est le commerce. 

Bousso la responsable est âgée de 50 ans, elle est mariée mère de six enfants trois filles et trois garçons; elle mène un commerce d'habits et de produits cosmétiques, elle a une cantine au marché central de Louga.Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en boubou noir-marron et a levé la main gauche.

Elle s'approvisionne à Dakar et à Touba et compte avec son prêt acheter 5 douzaines d'habits enfants, 3 douzaines  de parfum 10 douzaine de chaussures pour se faire beaucoup de revenus.

Avec ses bénéfices tirés de son activité, elle épargne chaque mois et réinjecte une part dans son commerce pour le développer davantage.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois Ndiang Bambodj Mousdalipha was created on December 27, 2010. The group PC 02 consists of 22 women from the same neighborhood. They are all related, and they work mainly in trade. 

Bousso, age 50, is the leader of the group. She is standing at the far right with her left hand raised, wearing a black dress. Bousso is a married mother of six children, three girls and three boys. She sells clothing and beauty products at the central market of Louga where she has a stall. 

Bousso buys her merchandise in Dakar and in Touba, She plans to use her loan to buy five dozen outfits for children, 3 dozen perfumes and 10 dozen pairs of shoes. Her goal is to bolster her income. 

She adds a portion of her profits to her savings every month, and another portion is reinvested in her activity to ensure its continuous expansion.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetic products for resale.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es: Luis Miguel es un joven responsable y trabajador quien siempre se ha destacado por ser muy emprendedor y por tener grandes ganas de salir adelante.  El se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, granos principales en la dieta básica del país, por lo que posee un mercado muy amplio. Él vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos en casa propia y es ella quien le ayuda a comercializar los productos que producen. Por ser la única fuente de ingresos con la que  cuentan, Luis solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en su cosecha, comprando mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar y así mismo abono. Con esto él espera mejorar sus ventas para contar con una presente y un futuro mejor tanto para él como para su familia.
texts.en: Luis Miguel is a responsable and hard-working youth who has always stood out as very entreprenuerial and for having a great desire to get ahead. He is a corn and bean farmer, principal grains in the country's basic diet. Luis Miguel lives with his wife and 2 children in his own house and she helps to sell the products he produces. Since this is their only source of income, Luis is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, to have the money necessary to invest in his harvest, purchasing a major quantity of seeds to sow and also, fertilizer. With this he hopes to increase his sales in order to improve the present and future for himself and his family.

loans.use: buy corn seeds and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional inventory of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
A very responsible mother and wife, Pacita, 47 years old, does everything to help her family and take care of the daily needs of her children. From the village of San Antonio, she is engaged in selling a variety of vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbage and fruits.

Pacita is requesting a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy cabbages, eggplants, tomatoes and bananas for her business. She hopes that someday she can complete her house for the convenience of her family.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, eggplants, tomatoes and bananas for her food business.

loans.name: Nodira

texts.en:
Nodira is 43 years old. She is a hard-working woman with a great desire to get ahead. Ilhom is her partner. They have a daughter named Farangis, who is 21 years old.

Nodira sells children's clothes. She sells her goods in the local market. She has a lot of customers. She makes periodic trips to accomplish her goal. She began working this way over 21 years ago because she needed to earn money. Currently, her partner helps her to purchase her goods. Because of the good results she is having, she wishes to increase her business by selling new kinds of clothing in addition her usual goods. 

This is her sixth loan with Imon International organization.  She is grateful for its financial support in helping her to realize her plans. She is one of Imon International's good clients, and she has a good credit story. 

She is asking for a loan of TJS 13,000 to buy goods for developing business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy new lines of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Munisakhon

texts.en:
Munisakhon is a 30-year-old woman living with her parents. She is not married and has no children.

She always wanted to have a good standard of living, so Munisakhon decided to start a new sewing business. Specifically, she sews women's national dresses in order to generate income with which she can contribute to her family's finances. She received some training at a women's business course, and she believes that she will be very successful because she is hardworking and smart.

She is asking for a loan in the amount of 500 TJS to buy a sewing machine. She hopes that the loan proceeds will allow her to generate more income so that her family can have a better quality of life and better financial opportunities. She thanks you for your support

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is a 34-year-old, married woman with two children. Cecilia lives in Banigan, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

To earn a living, Cecilia owns and operates a general store. She explains that she has operated this business for one year, and that she earns approximately 2,500 PHP per month doing this type of work.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 13,000 PHP to purchase more goods for her general store. Cecilia has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Cecilia hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for her general store

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a 40-year-old, married woman with seven children. Marilou lives in Lopoc, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.

To earn a living, Marilou sells dresses. She explains that she has operated this business for two years, and that she earns approximately 800 PHP per month doing this type of work.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 7,000 PHP to purchase different kinds of dresses to re-sell to her customers. Marilou has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Marilou hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional dresses for her clothing business

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria, from the village of Guayabal, is 46 years old, married, and the mother of three children, one of whom is married married. Through her sacrifices, Gloria was able to educate all her children and they are now all working.

Gloria works hard through her retailing business, which she has had for four years. To improve it, she is requesting a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy canned goods, egg, noodles, soft-drinks, and assorted bread to sell. Gloria says that the loan will be very helpful in contributing to the success of her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, egg, noodles, soft-drinks, and assorted bread to sell.

loans.name: Anastacio Francisco

texts.es: Francisco Gómez de 51 años de edad, habita en su vivienda junto a sus 3 hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de maíz y sorgo. Se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante 20 años de su vida y es así como se gana el pan de cada día. Él es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy conocido en la zona por su enorme corazón y amabilidad para con los demás. Debido a que ya es temporada de siembra tomo la decisión de comenzar a prepararse. Es por esa razón que ha decidido solicitar este nuevo crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Lo que más desea es que su cosecha sea abundante y mejor que las anteriores, ya que esta es la forma en que él consigue el sustento para su familia.  Confía en Dios que con su ayuda, su dedicación y empeño en el  trabajo lograra el sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco Gomez is 51 years old and lives in his home with his three children. He makes a living in agriculture, planting corn and sorghum. He has been working in this field for 20 years of his life and this is how he makes a living each day. He is a hard working man who is responsible and very well known in the area for his big heart and friendliness with others. 

Because it is now planting season he made the decision to begin to prepare himself. It is for this reason that he has chosen to request this new loan with Integral. He will invest in the purchase of seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc. What he hopes for the most is that he may have an abundant harvest that is better than previous ones. This is the way in which he will continue to provide for his family. He trusts in God that with help, dedication and persistence in his work he will achieve his dream to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Mao is married and operates a farm as the primary source of her income. She has been in this field for many years. 

She became a widow a few years ago, and she is responsible for four children at her age of 56 years. All her children now are dedicated to the garment industry to uplift their living conditions as well as to help their mother. Recently, her oldest child is already settled for marriage.

Mao wants to have a suitable house and provide a comfortable living status to all her children.   Because of the decayed wallboard, the family was afflicted by rain within this rainy season. In this regard, Mao has applied for a loan through HKL, a longstanding Kiva partner, to buy wallboard and pay construction workers. 

In years to come, Mao plans to purchase extra land to expand her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase wallboard and pay construction workers.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is 47 years old,and she has been in active farming for 15 consecutive years.  She currently runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. Her produce includes mainly bananas, milk, and coffee for the local market. 

She is married with five children, with the last two of school-going age.

Hellen has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to build a zero-grazing unit and buy animal feed. She wants to buy enough animal feed while it is still cheap, reflecting the prevailing weather conditions.   She hopes this will in turn save her a lot of money and help her improve her family's  living standards.

Hellen says that the poor road network and pests that attack farm harvests (especially cereals) are her main challenges.

loans.use: To construct a zero-grazing unit and buy animal feed.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a resident of Murang’a in central Kenya, where she has been practicing mixed farming for three years.  Her current farm produce includes  beans, maize, cabbages, and potatoes, all being sold within the local market. She is married with two children, ages six years and one year.

Fridah has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her put up a greenhouse where she will grow tomatoes. She says a greenhouse will improve her farming income due to consistent production and good quality of produce, which will fetch better prices. 

She adds that farming has been her only source of income, and she hopes to improve the living standards of her family.  Fridah says lack of capital is her main challenge.

loans.use: To construct a greenhouse to grow tomatoes.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy groceries in bulk for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients in making snacks

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a resident of Nkubu in central Kenya, where she has practiced mixed farming for three years. Milk and vegetables are her main produce. She runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. Besides farming, Grace runs a cereals retail business.

Grace has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her boost her farming. She will use the money to buy cereals seeds and do intensive farming of the cereals she retails, like maize and sorghum. 

She believes her own production will help her earn better income from her cereals retailing, as opposed to sourcing from other farmers and middlemen.

Grace says poor infrastructure and both crop and animal diseases remain the major challenges in farming as well as in her cereals retail business. She appreciates the support Juhudi Kilimo is giving to farmers.

loans.use: To buy cereals seeds for intensive farming.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos Alberto de 37 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad, su familia es muy unida y trabajadora ya que tanto Carlos como su esposa velan por el bien de su familia. El posee una granja donde se dedica a criar pollos, dicha granja esta es su casa de habitación. Con el propósito de poder obtener la mayor cantidad de ganancias, Carlos junto a su esposa son los único en realizar este duro trabajo, realizando todas las actividades como alimentarlos, vitaminarlos, comercializarlos y más. Carlos posee muchos clientes fijos por lo que los vende con mucha facilidad, razón principal por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y así poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más pollos, concentrado para alimentarlos y pollerías para colocarlos, con lo que él espera obtener nuevos clientes y de esta forma aumentar en gran manera sus ventas.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto, 37, lives with his wife and two minor children.  His family is very close and hardworking as both Carlos and his wife look after the welfare of their family. He owns a farm dedicated to raising chickens, the farm is also his home. In order to obtain the greatest revenue, Carlos and his wife are the only ones doing the hard work, performing all the activities such as feeding, giving vitamins, selling and more. 

Carlos has many loyal customers to whom he easily sells. His main reason for requesting a loan to INTEGRAL, is so that he can have the money to invest in buying more chickens.  He will concentrate in feeding them and coops to place them.  Carlos hopes to gain new customers and thus greatly increase his sales.

loans.use: to purchase food and vitamins to raise chickens.

loans.name: Joeris

texts.en: Joeris is married with 2 children. She is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. Joeris is a farmer, and she operates a banana production business. She also raises vegetables, particularly chili peppers, to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years, and every month she earns 3,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers, such as manure. Joeris joined GDMPC in 2010. In the future, Joeris hopes to improve/expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, such as manure

loans.name: Njenga

texts.en:
Njenga is 29 years old, married, and has two children. Their ages are 4 and 6.  He rears poultry to earn a living.  He has been in poultry farming for two years.  He employs two people in his business.  He also owns a mobile phone money transfer business to earn extra income.  He hopes to grow his poultry business in the future.
  
Njenga needs 100,000 KES to buy chicks, chicken mash, and to expand his poultry house.

loans.use: To buy chicks, chicken mash, and to expand his poultry house

loans.name: Mohruhsor

texts.en:
Mohruhsor is 20 years old. She is a hard-working young girl with a great desire to become a successful business woman. She is not married yet and lives with parents. Her parents love her very much. 

Her mother works at the archive of their region, which pays a small salary.  Her salary is not enough for improving the family's condition, so she advised Mohruhsor to begin a new business deal. 

With this aim, Mohruhsor studied the course "To get a success" and got enough skills about business. She is going to be busy with selling cosmetics. 

She will acquire her products in shopping centers in the region. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 TJS to buy cosmetics goods, and she is grateful for its financial support in helping her to realize her plans.  

She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is from the village of Cabisera 27. She is 53 years old and married, with eight school-age children. 

Carmelita raises pigs to fatten and sell. She has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns about 4,000 PHP a month. 

Carmelita is requesting a new loan of 9,000 PHP to purchase piglets to raise and sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise and sell.

loans.name: El Arca De La Fe Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “El arca de la Fe” está conformado por 19 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; pintor de autos, abarrotes, venta de dulces, repostería, venta de ropa, venta de joyas, venta de muebles, productos de belleza, almacén, librería, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Chillan.
Doris, presidenta del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie hacia el fondo del grupo, ocupando el sexto lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste una blusa blanca, lleva puesto unos aros grandes de color gris, su cabello es oscuro y lo usa suelto.
Ella se dedica al rubro de arte y decoración, específicamente pinta cuadros, desde hace 2 años. Se desempeña en su rubro de lunes a domingo y su horario lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad. Su negocio lo ubica en dos partes, uno es un local cerca de donde vive, y el otro es  un taller que lo ubica en su propia casa.
Su mercadería usualmente la compra en librerías y distribuidoras de maderas, a bajo costo por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará materia prima (materia extraída de la naturaleza), acrílicos para pintar sus cuadros.
Una de las metas de Doris en su negocio es tener más cuadros para la venta, hacer nuevas propagandas para su local para que sea más visible a todas las personas.
Doris vive junto a m su esposo y sus tres hijos de 14, 6 y 5 años de edad. Sus sueños son tener su casa propia y poder habilitar un local en el centro para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
Ella se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación. Por otro lado las capacitaciones, le han servido para aprender nuevas estrategias de venta y contabilidad.
Chillán es una comuna de la zona centro sur de Chile. Su nombre significa “silla del sol” en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches. Chillán es conocida como “Cuna de la Patria” o “Tierra de Artistas”, debido a que en la ciudad han nacido destacados personajes de la historia de Chile, como por ejemplo el conocido pianista Claudio Arrau.
texts.en:
Introducing “El Arca de la Fe” (Faith’s Ark), a Communal Bank composed of 19 entrepreneurs coming from the town of Chillán. They engages in different activities such as painting cars, running a general store, selling sweets, selling pastry, selling clothes, selling jewels, selling furniture, selling beauty products, running a warehouse, running a bookstore and other services.
Doris is the President of this Communal Bank Group. In the picture she is standing at the back of the group, occupying the sixth place from left to right. She is wearing a white blouse, two big grey earrings, and she is wearing her dark hair down.
She has been engaging in arts and decorations, specifically in painting pictures, for 2 years. She works Mondays to Sundays, her working hours depending on her availability. She has two workplaces: one is a locale close to where she lives and the other is a workshop she has set up in her own house.
She generally buys her products in bookstores and wood supplying companies, as they sell at low prices and this is economically convenient for her.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy natural basic materials and acrylics to paint her pictures.
Two of the goals Doris has for her activity are to have more pictures to sell and to make new advertisements for her shop in order to bring it to everybody’s attention.
Doris lives with her husband and their three children aged 14, 6 and 5. She dreams of having her own house and of succeeding in setting up a locale in the city center in order to offer a better standard of living to her family.
She is very happy and deeply grateful for the opportunity she has been given by Fondo Esperanza, as this will help her investing in her activity. She says that there is good communication in the Communal Bank she is a member of; on a different note, the seminars have helped her learning new selling and accounting strategies.
Chillán is a commune in the south-central part of Chile. Its name means “Seat of the Sun” in Mapudungun, the language of our indigenous Mapuches. Chillán is known as the “Cradle of the Fatherland” or “Land of Artists” because many outstanding figures in Chilean history were born in this city like, for example, the well-known pianist, Claudio Arrau.

loans.use: To buy natural basic materials and acrylics.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy runs a grocery to earn a living. She previously took out a loan of 30,000 Kenya Shillings, which she used to buy onions, carrots, and tomatoes. 

Since she serviced the loan, she has witnessed a lot of growth in her business.  She has requested another loan of 70,000 KES to buy tomatoes for resale.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes for resale.

loans.name: Ulises De Jesús

texts.es: Ulises de Jesús de 27 años de edad,  vive junto a su esposa e hijos, y se dedica al oficio de la siembra, lo cual aprendió muy bien de su padre. Ulises siembra frijoles y maíz, lo cual ha sido un negocio que por generaciones ha logrado sacar a la familia adelante y de la cual dependen por completo su esposa e hijos. Razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL teniendo como meta sembrar mayor cantidad de semillas y así obtener más cosecha la cual pueda comercializar a buen precio. Es por esto que es de mucha importancia para Ulises contar con el dinero necesario para comprar las mejores semillas, abono y pesticidas y de esta forma brindar calidad a sus clientes. Ulises es un padre de familia con grandes deseos  en darles todo lo mejor a sus hijos, lo que le impulsa a esforzarse más día con día y querer crecer en su negocio, sembrando más y vendiendo más.
texts.en:
Ulises de Jesús is 27 years old and lives together with his wife and children. He works in the farming trade, which he learned very well from his father. 

Ulises plants beans and corn, a business that has managed to keep the family going for generations and upon which his wife and children are completely dependent. That's the reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, with the goal of sowing a greater quantity of seeds and thus obtaining a larger harvest, which he will be able to sell at a good price. It's very important for Ulises to have the money necessary to buy the best seed, fertilizer, and pesticides so he can offer quality crops to his clients. 

Ulises is a family man with high hopes for giving all the best to his children, which drives him to work hard day after day and to want to grow his business, planting more and selling more.

loans.use: to buy supplies for growing staple grain crops.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos tiene 56 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida e hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años. Sus principales cultivos son el maíz y maicillo. Año con año repite esta actividad ya que es la forma que aprendió para ganarse la vida. Carlos es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y con mucha experiencia en sus labores. Vive en condiciones muy humildes junto con su familia y esta situación le sirve de incentivo para continuar luchando y dando lo mejor de si y de esta manera lograra dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos diferente a la agricultura. Es por esta razón que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un nuevo préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra del abono, semillas, fertilizantes entre otros, ya que es la época para realizar la siembra de los diferentes granos. Con mucha confianza en Dios y en su trabajo espera tener una cosecha abundante la cual pueda vender y conseguir ingresos para solventar las necesidades de su hogar, con esto espera cumplir su sueño de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is 56 years old and lives in his own house, together with his life partner and children. He has worked in agriculture for many years. His main crops are corn and sorghum. Year after year, he repeats this activity, because that's the way he has learned to earn a living. 

Carlos is a very hardworking, responsible person with a lot of experience in his work. He lives in very humble conditions with his family, and that situation serves as an incentive for him to keep struggling and giving his best; that's how he will manage to provide his family with a better quality of life. He works very hard to bring bread home every day since he has no other source of income besides agriculture. It's for that reason that he has decided to request a new loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of fertilizer, seeds, and more, since this is the season for sowing different grains. 

With great trust in God and in his work, Carlos hopes to have an abundant harvest that he can sell, earning income to cover household necessities so that he can realize his dream of giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.en:
Nasiba is married. Her husband is builder. They have three children. She has always wanted to comfort them with all necessary things for a good quality of life. 

Nasiba decided to start a new business selling clothing to generate an income so she can contribute to her home’s finances.  If you will help her with money, she would buy children’s clothes. 

She studied the course of "To get a success" and got enough skills about business.  She will sell her goods in the local market. She will be a very successful business woman as she is hardworking and smart. 

She is asking for a loan of 3000 TJS to buy children's clothes for organizing her new business. She will get through, using the loan, and her business will go on to be a source of income, so her family can have a good quality of life and better financial opportunities to progress. 

She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy children’s clothes to sell.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a widow with five grown children.   She owns and operates a grocery store. Lolita has been engaged in her business for over 12 years and earns about 8,000 PHP a month. 

Lolita joined ASKI to gain access to financial services. She wanted to help improve her living situation and increase her ability to engage in business activities. Lolita has successfully repaid a previous loan. This previous loan was used to purchase baby livestock. 

Lolita is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase snack foods, drinks, noodles, and spices for her store. 

In the future, Lolita hopes her business will sufficiently expand to allow her to help meet the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, drinks, noodles, and spices to offer for sale in her store

loans.name: Carlos Rolando

texts.es: Carlos Rolando de 44 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y sus seis hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como el maíz y frijoles. Después de recolectar su cosecha pone  a la venta cierta parte de los granos básicos, siendo esta su principal fuente de ingresos, por otro lado se dedica a la corta de café y jornalero para poder tener una fuente de ingresos extra y así suplir con las muchas necesidades de su hogar. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él ya que es un hombre trabajador, responsable y honesto.  Cada día siente que las necesidades de su hogar son mayores por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL  ya que por medio de la ayuda de esta institución el podrá comprar los insumos necesarios semillas, abonos, venenos para plagas, etc. para seguir cultivando los granos básicos que le permitan seguir llevando el sustento a su grupo familiar. Espera y confía en Dios que obtendrá resultados positivos y logrará su sueño de brindar a su querida familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos Rolando is 44 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their six children. He works with basic grains such as corn and beans. After gathering their harvest, he sells some of the basic grains, this being his main source of income.  On the side he works cutting coffee and as a laborer to have a source of extra income to meet the many needs of his home. 

Many people give good references for him as he is a hard worker, responsible and honest. Each day he feels that the needs of his home are greater so he has decided to apply for this loan from INTEGRAL.  Through the help of this institution he will be able to purchase the necessary inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, pest poisons, etc. to continue cultivating basic grains so that he can continue providing sustenance for his family.  He waits and trusts in God so that he will get positive results and achieve his dream of giving his beloved family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase necessary inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, pest poisons, etc.

loans.name: Santos Dionisio

texts.es: Santos Dionisio de 46 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia. Él se ha dedicado a la agricultura durante toda su vida y sus principales cultivos son el maíz y frijol. De esta forma brinda lo necesario a su familia. Después de recoger la cosecha pone  a la venta cierta parte de los granos básicos para poder suplir el resto de necesidades del hogar. Es muy conocido en la zona como una persona honrada, honesta, trabajadora y responsable. Cada día siente que las necesidades de su hogar son mayores por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL  ya que con la ayuda de esta institución podrá comprar los insumos necesarios semillas, abonos, venenos para plagas, etc. para seguir cultivando los granos básicos que le permitan llevar el pan de cada día de su hogar. Con la ayuda de Dios y de INTEGRAL espera que en esta nueva cosecha obtendrá resultados positivos y será mas abundante que la anterior, esto ayudara a alcanzar su sueño de brindar a su querida familia mejores condiciones económicas.
texts.en:
Santos Dionisio is 46 years old and lives with his family in his own home.  He has been a farmer all his life, and his main crops are corn and beans.  This allows him to provide his family with the sustenance that they need.  After harvesting he sells a certain portion of his crops so that he can meet the rest of the needs of his family.

He is well known in his area as an honest, hardworking and responsible person.  As the household expenses are growing every day, he has decided to seek a loan from INTEGRAL.  With the help of this institution he will be able to buy the supplies he needs, such as seeds, fertilizer and fungicide.  This will allow him to continue harvesting his crops, which will in turn allow him to provide for his family day to day.  

With the help of God and of INTEGRAL, he hopes that in the next harvest he will achieve good results and obtain a better harvest than the last one.  This will help him to reach his dream of improving the economic condition of his beloved family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, fungicide, and other items.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 40 years old.  He runs a grocery to earn a living.  With the income from his business, he is able to provide for his wife and two children.  

His desire is to grow his business so he can get enough income to provide his children a good education. 
 
He has requested a loan of 20,000 KES to buy fruits, green peppers, and carrots.

loans.use: To buy fruits, green peppers, and carrots to resell.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.en:
This is Nieves, 48 years old and a resident of Taguig City, Philippines.  She is married to Ernesto and a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Nieves operates a buy and sell business. What she basically does is to buy coffee and other products from wholesalers, then sell them to customers at a profit. She also does home-service massage therapy for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 300 in sales daily.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy more quantities of coffee and other products to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Nieves hopes her business will grow in the coming years.  She dreams to be able to give her family a good future and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. 

She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of their work.  It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for stocks of coffee and other supplies needed in her business

loans.name: Ndiang Bambodj Mousdalipha Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Ndiang Mbambodj Mousdalipha existe depuis le 27 décembre 2010;le groupe PS est composé de trois femmes très dynamiques qui sont issues du même quartier, elles sont parentes et leur activité principale est le commerce. 


Mariama la vedette est âgée de 26 ans, elle est célibataire sans enfant, elle mène un commerce d'habits et de produits de beauté (cosmétiques,mèches, greffage), chaussures.Elle est debout à droite sur la photo avec une écharpe autour de la tête et a levé la main gauche.

Elle s'approvisionne à Dakar et Touba pour revendre au marché central de Louga où elle possède une cantine.


Avec son prêt elle va acheter 1 carton de mèches et de greffage, 10 douzaines d'habits enfants, 12 douzaines  de paires de chaussures pour maximiser ses revenus.

Avec ses bénéfices elle épargne chaque mois dans le système, aide ses parents, gère ses besoins personnels et compte développer son commerce.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois Ndiang Mbambodj Mousdalipha was created in December 27 2010. The PS group is made up of three very dynamic women all from the same neighborhood. They are related to each other and their main activity is retail. Mariama, the group's leader, is 26, single, with no children. She sells clothing and beauty products (make up, hair extensions, hair weaves), and shoes. She is standing on the right of the photo with a scarf around her head and her left hand raised. 

Mariama obtains her supplies in Dakar and Touba to re-sell at the central market in Louga where she has a stall. With her loan, she will buy 1 box of hair extensions and weaves, 10 dozen children's outfits, and12 dozen pairs of shoes, to maximize her income. With the profit, she saves in the system each month, helps her family, manages her personal needs and plans to develop her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing, beauty products and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Alfonso de 47 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable, quien trabaja  muy duro por sacar adelante a su esposa y 6 hijos menores de edad y quienes dependen de él por completo. Para brindarle todo lo necesario a su familia, Alfonso se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles cosecha la cual desea aumentar en gran manera, ya que es la única forma que posee de ganarse la vida, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL,  a través  del cual puede contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, así mismo para preparar la tierra y tener los insumos necesarios para invertir en el cuidado de las matas. Con el aumento de cultivo Alfonso tiene la esperanza de aumentar sus ventas lo que sería de mucha ayuda para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
texts.en: Alfonso is 47 years old.  He is very responsible and works hard to support his wife and 6 minor children, all of whom depend entirely on him.  In order to provide his family with everything they need, Alfonso grows corn and beans.  He wants to significantly increase his crops, as that is the only way he has to earn a living.  He is therefore requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he will have the money he needs to invest in purchasing greater quantities of corn and beans to plant.   He will also be able to prepare the land and have the tools he needs to care for his plants.  With a larger crop, Alfonso hopes to increase his sales, which will help him support his household.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides for crops.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is from Manla, Sapang Dalaga. She is 33 years old and a widow, with two children. 

To make a living, she manage a fish cage, where she raises fish for sale. She has been engaged in her business for three years and earns PHP 9,000 a month for these activities. In 2010, Myrna joined GDMPC. 

Myrna is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 that will be used to buy young fish to raise and twine to expand the business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy young fish to raise and twine to expand her fish-cage business.

loans.name: Sokhna  Bousso's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été crée le 21 Décembre 2009. Il est composé de membres habitant la même zone et solidaires entre elles. Leur activité principale reste le petit commerce.

Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, Aby la vedette est âgée de 41 ans. 

Elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont 4 garçons et une fille. 

Son prêt reçu, elle va acheter 5 paniers de poissons séchés, 6 paniers de poissons fumés , une dizaine de kgs de poulpes et d'huitres séchées. 

Avec ses bénéfices, elle renforce son épargne pour accéder à une autonomie financière et le reste paie ses intérêts.
texts.en:
This group was set up on December 21 2009. It is made up of women who live in the same neighborhood and who support each other. Their main activity is small-scale retail. 

Standing at the right of the photo, hand raised, Aby, the group's leader, is 41 years old. She is married and has five children - 4 boys and one girl. When she receives her loan, she will buy 5 baskets of dried fish, 6 baskets of smoked fish, around ten kilos of octopus and dried oysters. With the profit, she will increase her savings in order to achieve financial independence, and pay the interest with the rest.

loans.use: to buy dried and smoked fish to resell at the weekly markets.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 36 años de edad,  vive junto a su esposa  y tres  hijos menores de edad. Santos  se dedica a la siembra de maíz para posteriormente venderlos, así mismo cultivo jocotes, el cual es una fruta típica de este país, que en su temporada se vende en grandes cantidades. Santos  es un señor muy responsable a quien le gusta dar calidad en sus productos, razón por la que cuenta con gran cantidad de clientes. Él desea invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de abono y semillas para sembrar y arboles de jocote, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual espera lograr un aumento de ventas y así mismo obtener nuevos clientes de manera que pueda ganar lo más posible con su trabajo, ya que solo de esta forma podrá contar con una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Santos is 36 and lives with his wife and three young children.  He grows corn and sells it upon harvesting.  He also grows jocote trees, which is a common fruit tree in El Salvador.  When it is in season, large quantities of this fruit are sold.

Santos is a very responsible man who likes to produce a high-quality product -- this is the reason he has a great number of customers.

He is seeking a loan in order to purchase a larger quantity of fertilizer and seeds to sow, as well as jocote tree seedlings.  He hopes that this will lead to an increase in sales and that he will be able to gain new customers, which will in turn allow him to obtain the greatest possible profit.  This is the only way in which he can be assured of greater financial stability.

loans.use: to buy jocote tree seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
SANTIAGO TIENE 54 AÑOS, ESTA CASADO Y ES CONOCIDO EN EL MEDIO POR SU LABOR DE SERVICIO DE CARPINTERIA. EL   
VIVE CON SU CONYUGE E HIJA Y GOZA DE MUY BUENAS REFERENCIAS Y UNA FAMILIA UNIDA. VIVE EN UNA COMUNIDAD DEDICADA AL COMERCIO, AGRICULTURA Y GANADERIA. EL ES UNA PERSONA QUE DESDE MUY TEMPRANO HA DEMOSTRADO SER UN GRAN TRBAJADOR, RESPONSABLE Y UN OBJETIVO UNICO DE DARLE LO MEJOR A SU FAMILIA. POR ESTO DESDE HACE MUCHO SANTIAGO SE DEDICA AL SERVICIO DE CARPINTERIA EN SU DOMICILIO EN CAYALTI, AL NORTE DEL PERU. EL OFRECE UN SERVICIO CLAVE A SU COMUNIDAD, PARA ARREGLAR OBJETOS O PARTES DE LA CASAS QUE MUCHAS VECES SE ENCUENTRAN EN MAL ESTADO, ASI COMO DISENAR MUEBLES PARA CASA O NEGOCIOS. POR ESTE MOTIVO SANTIAGO BUSCA UN CREDITO DE 1600 SOLES CON EDPYME ALTERNATIVA Y EL APOYO DE KIVA PARA COMPRAR MAS MERCADERIAS (MADERA CEDRO, PEGAMENTO, MADERA CAOBA, ETC) PARA SURTIR SU NEGOCIO Y SU RESPECTIVA VENTA. ASI ATENDERA LA DEMANDA INSATISFECHA EN EL LUGAR,  AMPLIARÁ SU CARTERA DE CLIENTES, CONTANDO CON CLIENTES NUEVOS E INGRESOS ADICIONALES A LA FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Santiago, 54, is married and well known in the environment for his carpentry services.  He lives with his spouse and daughter and enjoys very good references and a united family.  He lives in a community dedicated to commerce, agriculture and animal husbandry.  

He’s a person who started being a great, responsible worker from a very young age whose only goal was to give his family the best.  Because of this, Santiago has been working in carpentry at home in Cayalti in north Perú.  He provides his community with a key service needed to repair objects or parts of houses that are often in poor condition as well as designing furniture for homes or businesses.  

It’s because of this that Santiago is looking for a 1600 sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa with Kiva support to buy more merchandise (cedar lumber, glue, mahogany, etc.) to stock his business and sales thus meeting currently unmet customer demand.  He will expand his clientele leading to new, additional income for his family.

loans.use: to buy carpentry supplies.

loans.name: Elesita

texts.en:
Elesita is 37 years old. She is married and has four children.  With all  her children in school, Elesita works very hard to provide for them.  She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her store.

Elesita has been in this business for 7 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, laundry soap and other miscellaneous items.  In the future, Elesita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pottery business in the Philippines.

Gloria requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

She has been in this business for 30 years now, and she also earns additional income from her general store.

In the future, Gloria would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia is 49 years old.  She is married and has one child. Amalia works very hard to provide for her child.  Amalia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock, such as sugar, soap and other grocery items to sell.

Amalia has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap and other grocery items. In the future, Amalia would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan Antonio de 26 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres y hermanos.  Juan se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maíz, frijoles y maicillo siendo esta su principal fuente de ingresos y a realizado estas tareas por mucho tiempo para ganarse la vida. Además se dedica a trabajar como jornalero para generar ingresos extras. Él es un hombre muy responsable, honesto y dedicado en sus trabajos. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos los cuales siempre dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. Cada año Juan se esmera para realizar esta actividad ya que es una persona muy humilde y de escasos recursos y necesita de sus trabajos para salir adelante. Este año al igual que los anteriores ha decidido cultivar la tierra y ya que la temporada de siembra comienza, quiere estar preparado con los  insumos agrícolas necesarios  para cosechar los principales granos básicos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL, ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios  para realizar dicha inversión. El crédito le servirá para invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  etc. esperando lograr así que la cosecha de este años sea la mejor de todas y que esto le ayude a venderla a un mejor precio para generar los ingresos esperados y darle un mejor bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Antonio is 26 years old and lives with his parents and siblings.  He grows crops such as corn, beans and sorghum.  This is his main source of income, and he puts a lot of time into this work in order to make a living.  He also works as a day laborer in order to make extra money.

He is a very responsible and honest man who is dedicated to his work.  He is well-known among his neighbors, who attest to the quality of his work as well as his qualities as a person.  Every year he makes a great deal of effort in his farming activities since he is a very humble person with few resources, and he relies on hard work in order to get ahead.  

This year, as in the past, he has decided to cultivate his land.  Since the planting season is starting, he wants to be prepared with the agricultural supplies that he needs in order to grow his crops.  This is why he is seeking this loan from INTEGRAL; he does not currently have the resources to make these investments.  

He will use the loan proceeds to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizer and insecticide.  This year he hopes to have his best harvest yet.  This should allow him to sell his crops at better prices so he can increase his income and the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizer and insecticide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and others.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.en: Accion USA just funded Mauricio, a business owner whose purpose is to use art to help preserve the history and culture of the Amazon!  Mauricio has owned Amazon Art for over seven years. He began his business in the Amazon region of Brazil in 2005.  In October of 2011, Mauricio established Amazon Art Import and Export in the US to improve the exportation of products made by Native Brazilians. Mauricio has done extensive research on the Brazilian Rainforest as well about the native culture of the region. Throughout his studies, Mauricio has marked the unique cultural changes taking place in the Amazon due in large part, to migration to the cities.  The migration to cities and increased movement of the Amazon peoples has resulted in numerous cultural and religious evolvements.  Mauricio began his business with the purpose of preserving the authenticity of the original Amazon culture.  He captures Amazon culture through art.  In particular, his business focuses on the sale of handcrafts, ornaments, and utensils made from raw materials of the Brazilian Rain Forest.  Amazon Art products are made without industrial processes. All artifacts are made from raw materials from the Amazon regions.

loans.use: to purchase inventory

loans.name: Miguel Obelio

texts.es: Miguel Obelio  tiene 46 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijos. Él se a dedicado al cultivo de los principales granos básicos durante muchos años de su vida. Además de esta activada la cual realiza año con año para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar,  también se dedica a la albañileria en los tiempos de poco cultivo. Estas actividades son las que le permiten  cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar. El es un hombre trabajador,  honrado y responsable que pone su mayor empeño para siempre obtener buenos resultados.  Vive en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y esto lo motiva a trabajar duramente para dar lo mejor a su familia ya que es la única forma  de poder cambiar la realidad en la que se encuentran. El confía en  Dios y en su arduo trabajo para lograr sus objetivos, es por eso que decidio acercarse a esta  institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar un crédito el cual le servira para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios para sus cultivos como abono, semillas, pesticidas, etc. y  de esta forma poder tener un poco mas de ingresos y suplir las principales necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel Obelio, 46, lives in a house he owns with his wife and children.  He has been growing basic grains for many years.  In addition to this activity that he does year to year in order to earn his daily bread for his family, he also works in construction during the low agriculture seasons.  These activities allow him to cover his household’s basic needs.  

He is a hardworking, honest, responsible man who puts his maximum effort into always getting the best results.  He lives in very humble conditions with his family and this motivates him to work hard to give his family the best since this is the only way to change their present reality.  He trusts in God and in his hard work to reach his objectives which is why he’s decided to approach INTEGRAL to request a loan he can use to buy supplies necessary for his crops like manure, seeds, pesticide, etc. in order to earn a bit more income and meet his family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Edgar Franklin

texts.es: Edgar Franklin de 20 años de edad, es un joven muy trabajador, quien se dedica de lleno a su trabajo y familia, él es responsable de sus tres hermanos menores de edad, por quien se esfuerza para salir adelante, ya que es el responsable de ellos. Edgar trabaja sembrando maíz y frijoles, actividad que realiza junto a dos de sus hermanos, junto a quienes posteriormente comercializa en mercados y diferentes agencias que distribuyen granos básicos. El mayor deseo de Edgar es poder aumentar sus ventas ya que este negocio es la única fuente de ingresos que posee para brindarles todo lo necesario a sus tres hermanos, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de esta forma invertir en la compra de abono, insecticidas, y otros insumos más para obtener una cosecha excelente.
texts.en: Edgar Franklin, 20, is a very hardworking young man who is totally dedicated to his work and to his family.  He’s responsible for his three minor brothers for whom he strives to get ahead since he’s responsible for them.  Edgar works growing corn and beans, an activity he carries out with two of his brothers; he and they then sell them in markets and various agencies that distribute basic grains.  Edgar’s greatest wish is to be able to increase his sales because this business is the only source of income he has to provide everything necessary for his three brothers which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy manure, insecticide and other supplies needed to obtain an excellent harvest.

loans.use: to buy manure and pesticide.

loans.name: Saoul

texts.en: Accion USA just funded Saoul, the proud owner of Heed Magazine. Established in 2009, Heed Magazine is an urban, spiritually-based publication targeting a city-dwelling, multi-ethnic, 18-35 year old demographic. The magazine fills a niche in the urban marketplace highlighting topics, venues and personalities with a positive, clean-edge, yet hip twist that lends inspirational perspectives on current events and pop culture.  Saoul brings a great deal of experience in design, communication and publishing to Heed Magazine.   He studied Visual Arts and Graphic Design as an undergraduate, and recently completed a Masters in Graphic Communications Management and Technology during which he focused on publishing. Saoul needs a loan to carry out print production of the next three issues hitting newsstands this fall.  Help Saoul jump his business as he states “into the lane of making real revenue”.

loans.use: to pay for print production of his magazine for three issues.

loans.name: Jinky

texts.en:
Jinky is 29 years old and married, with two children, one of whom is in school.

Jinky is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Jinky has been raising pigs for three years now, and she has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Jinky would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Estefania

texts.en:
Estefania is from the village of Capellan province of Isabela. She is 58 years old and married, with adult-aged children. 

Estefania owns and operates a store, selling a variety of products in the local community. With her vending business, she earns about 6,000 PHP a month. Estefania joined ASKI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. 

She is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. In the future, Estefania hopes that her business can expand to sustain the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, coffee, snack foods, and drinks for her store.

loans.name: Émilie

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois Santhiaba Centre Mame Fatou Wade  existe depuis le 27 décembre 2010;Madame Émilie bénéficiaire du  Prêt Spécial est membre depuis l'inauguration, elle est au cycle 4. 


Émilie est âgée de 58 ans, elle est mariée mère de dix enfants, couturière elle a son atelier à domicile et elle mène parallèlement un commerce de riz, d'habits et de chaussures.

Elle s'approvisionne pour le riz dans le Walo, les tissus à Dakar, les habits et chaussures viennent du Maroc.


Avec son prêt elle va acheter des tissus, des chaussures, des sacs de riz en quantité suffisante pour revendre et ainsi se faire plus de revenus.

Avec ses bénéfices elle épargne chaque mois dans le système, contribue à la gestion de la famille et souhaite atteindre une autonomie financière.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois Santhiaba Centre Mame Fatou Wade  has been in existence since December 27, 2010; Mrs. Émilie, beneficiary of a Special Loan, has been a member since its inauguration and is on her fourth loan.

Émilie is 58 years old, married, and the mother of ten children.  She is a seamstress with her own workshop at home, and on the side she also sells rice, clothing, and shoes.  She buys rice in Walo, fabric in Dakar, and the clothing and shoes are from Morocco.

With her loan, Émilie will buy fabric, shoes, and bags of rice in large enough quantities to resell and increase her income.  Out of these profits, she sets aside money each month in savings in the Banc Villageois, contributes to her family's expenses, and hopes to become financially independent.

loans.use: to buy fabric, shoes, and rice to resell.

loans.name: Santos Wenceslao

texts.es: Santos Wenceslao, en un hombre admirable, el cual no se cansa de trabajar y luchar por sacar adelante a su querida familia. Desde muy joven aprendió el oficio de la agricultura y hoy en día es como se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Cada año repite la misma activad, prepara la tierra, siembra maíz y frijoles y luego saca la cosecha para posteriormente ponerla a la venta. El señor santos habita con su compañera de vida y un nieto en casa de su propiedad. Para él lo mas importantes es que su grupo familiar tenga lo necesario para subsistir, esto es lo que lo motiva a continuar luchando día con día. Este año ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar este préstamo que le permita invertir en los fertilizantes necesarios para los cultivos y poder así obtener una abundante cosecha  que le permita continuar llevando el alimento a su hogar y mantener la esperanza de que con su trabajo, la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución logrará mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Santos Wenceslao is an admirable man who never tires of working and struggles to bring up his beloved family. From an early age he learned the trade of agriculture and today it is how he makes a living and how he is the daily breadwinner for his home.  Each year he repeats the same work of preparing the soil, planting corn and beans and then harvesting the crop and later putting it on sale.

Santos lives with his life partner and a grandson at his property. For him the most important thing is that his household has what it takes to survive.  This is what motivates him to keep fighting every day. This year he has decided to approach the institution, INTEGRAL, to apply for the requested loan so that he can invest in the fertilizer needed for crops to obtain an abundant harvest.  This allows him to continue taking food home and maintains his hope that with his work, God's help, and this institution, he will be able to achieve and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Jiadema

texts.en:
Jiadema is 48 years old and married, with three children.  With two children in school, Jiadema works very hard to provide for them.

Jiadema runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

Jiadema has been in this business for 14 years, and she sells a variety of items, such as bread, noodles, sugar, and other grocery items. 

In the future Jiadema would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional cleaning equipement

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for materials to make more shoes

loans.name: Cesar Antonio

texts.es: Cesar Antonio de 60 años de edad, se dedica  al cultivo y comercio de granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles. Cada año repite esta actividad con la ayuda de su hijo mayor desde ya hace muchos años, despues de sacar la cosecha pone  a la venta una  parte y la otra la deja para su consumo. Cesar y su familia se vieron muy afectados en la cosecha anterior ya que las tormentas que afectaron al pais hicieron que perdiera casi el 80% de sus cultivos, pero es así como se gana la vida y es importante mencionar que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Cesar se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honrado y muy responsable. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él y confían en el producto que comercializa ya que se esfuerza por que sea de muy buena calidad, es por eso que tomo la decisión de acercarse a la institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar este credito el cual le permita comprar los principales insumos agrícolas semillas, insecticidas, abonos, etc. y continuar cultivando la tierra para cosechar los principales  granos básicos que le permiten llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Confia que obtendrá resultados muy buenos y podrá lograr su sueño de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar Antonio, 60, works growing and selling basic grains like corn and beans.  He repeats this activity every year with help from his oldest son; he’s been doing this for many years.   Once he gathers his harvest he sells part of it and the rest is for his own consumption.  Cesar and his family were quite affected by the previous harvest because the storms that lashed the country caused them to lose 80% of their crops.  But this is how he earns his livelihood; it’s important to stress that this is his main source of income.

Cesar is noted for being a hardworking, honest, very responsible man.  Many people give him good references and trust in the product he sells because he strives for it to be of top quality.  This is why he’s decided to approach INTEGRAL to request a loan to buy the main farm supplies like seeds, insecticide, manure, etc. and continue cultivating the land to harvest the main basic grains that will allow him to provide his home with daily bread.  He trusts that he’ll obtain very good results and will be able to reach his dream of improving his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es: Florencio de 50 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos menores de edad.  Desde hace 30 años que Florencio  trabaja en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles, trabajo gracias al cual ha  podido salir adelante y criar a sus hijos.  Florencio desea contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar, motivo por el que solicita un préstamo  INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar todo los insumos necesarios como: maíz, frijoles, pesticidas y abono para realizar una mejor siembra de granos, los cuales espera comercializarlos a un buen precio y de esta forma poder aumentar sus ingresos, lo que es muy primordial para Florencio  puesto que solo de esta manera contara con una vida mejor para sus hijos y esposa.
texts.en: Florencio, 50, lives with his wife and three minor children.  Florencio has been growing corn and beans for the last 30 years, work thanks to which he’s been able to get ahead and raise his children.  Florencio would like to have the money needed to buy larger amounts of seeds to plant which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy the necessary supplies like corn, beans, pesticide and manure to carry out a better planting of grains that he hopes to sell for a better price thus increasing his income which is basic for Florencio because it’s the only way he’ll attain a better life for his children and his wife.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio, aprendió a cultivar la tierra desde muy niño y ahora a sus 41 años de edad es lo que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual consta de 7 personas. Toda su vida ha trabajado en la agricultura, principalmente en la siembra de maíz y frijoles. Mauricio es un hombre trabajador, honesto y sobre todo responsable. Su principal objetivo es sacar a delante a su familia ya que para él es lo más preciado y sueña con algún día verlos en mejores condiciones de vida. Todo esto lo ha hecho tomar la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar los insumos agrícolas (abonos, insecticidas, semillas, etc.) necesarios para el buen desarrollo de sus cultivos ya que solo de esta forma podrá continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar. Es una persona de mucha fe y confianza el cual confía que con su arduo trabajo logrará su sueño de dar estabilidad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Mauricio learned to farm at an early age and now at 41 years of age, it's what allows him to bring money home. He lives in his own home along with his family which consists of 7 persons. All his life he has worked in agriculture, mainly in the planting of corn and beans. 

Mauricio is a hard worker, who is honest and above all responsible. Hi main objective is to get ahead his family and for him, that is what is most precious.  He dreams of one day seeing them in better living conditions. All this is why he made the decision to approach the institution for a loan that allows him to buy agricultural inputs (fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, etc.) These are necessary for the proper development of his crops because only in this way he can continue bringing the daily bread home. 

Mauricio is a person of great faith and confidence who is confident that with hard work he will achieve his dream of economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Orbelina

texts.es: Orbelina de 47 años vive con su esposo y con sus 3 hijos en casa propia. Es una mujer muy trabajadora, honesta y siempre con la visión de entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia. Se dedica al cultivo de sorgo y es así como ella siempre tiene como darles de comer a su familia, Pero además posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia ya que maneja precios cómodos y es muy atenta a la hora de vender posee de abundante clientela y es así como ella solventa las necesidades de su hogar. Orbelina desea comprar insumos agrícolas para las próximas cosechas y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, insecticidas, pesticidas entre otros. Esta muy segura que con la ayuda que recibirá ella seguirá cultivando buenos granos y los seguirá vendiendo a precios cómodos como ella se caracteriza  por sus lugar de residencia, agradece la ayuda que recibirá y espera poderla solventar lo mas pronto posible.
texts.en: Orbelina is 47 years old.  She owns the home where she lives with her husband and 3 children. She is a very hardworking and honest woman with a constant vision of providing her family with a better future. She grows sorghum and this is how she always is able to feed her family, but she also has a small store located in her home.  She has good prices and is very attentive to her abundant clientele. This is how she meets her household needs.  Oberlina wants to buy agricultural supplies for the next harvest and for this reason she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, pesticide, etc.  She is sure that with this assistance she will continue to cultivate good grain and be able to sell it at good prices. She is thankful for the help and hopes to pay off her debt as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, pesticide, etc.

loans.name: Bonita

texts.en:
Bonita is 33 years old. She is married and has three children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Bonita is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy feed and medicines for her pigs.

Bonita has been raising pigs for 10 years and also earns additional income from a variety store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicines for her pigs.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto,  es un hombre trabajador el cual a sus 42 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de los principales granos básicos como maíz, frijoles y maicillo. No logró terminar sus estudios debido a la falta de recursos económicos de su familia esto lo llevo a trabajar la tierra desde muy temprana edad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el área. Año  con año realiza la misma actividad de preparar la tierra, sembrar los granos básicos, y cosechar los frutos de sus cultivos. Después de sacar la cosecha la pone a la venta en los principales puntos de venta de su municipio. De esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar y es así como ha logrado mantener a su familia por mucho tiempo. El cultivo de maíz, frijoles y maicillo es por temporada por lo que cada ano  todo campesino como Roberto tiene que trabajar muy duro para sacar lo mejor de la cosecha y así poder almacenar la cantidad necesaria para la subsistencia del resto del año. Al igual que cada temporada el señor Roberto no quiere quedarse atrás y se ha propuesto sacar una abundante cosecha ya que sueña con dar a sus hijos lo mejor y quiere sacarlos adelante para que gocen de mejores condiciones a las que él ha tenido acceso. Es por esta razón que solicita la ayuda de esta institución, INTEGRAL, para invertir en los insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para la obtención de una buena cosecha y poder lograr su sueño de dar a su familia lo mejor y poder lograr estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Roberto’s a hardworking man who at the age of 42 works growing basic grains like corn, beans and sorghum.  He did not finish his education because of his family’s lack of resources; he started working the land from a very young age so he now has quite a bit of experience in this line of work.

Year to year he carries out the same activity to prepare the land, plant basic grains and harvest the fruits.  Once he takes in the harvest he sells it in the municipality’s main sales points.  In this way he supports his home and is how he’s managed to support his family for a long time.

Growing corn, beans and sorghum is seasonal so every year Roberto, like all farmers, must work hard to get the best from his harvest and be able to store enough to subsist for the rest of the year.  Like in every season, Roberto does not want to fall behind and he’s determined to produce an abundant harvest because he dreams with providing his children with the best and he wants to move them ahead so that they can enjoy better conditions than those he’s been able to attain for himself.  Because of this, he’s asking for help from INTEGRAL to buy farming supplies (manure, seeds, insecticide, etc.) needed to produce a good harvest and to reach his dream of giving his family the best and to attain economic stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Ebby

texts.en:
Ebby is a 54 year-old businesswoman.  She makes and sells doughnuts in her food stall.  She has engaged in the business for three years and has employed one person.  She has been able to grow her business since she joined Faulu Kenya.  This is because she has been trained in business management skills.  She has also managed to buy a piece of land where she wants to build her own home.

Ebby needs a loan of 40,000 KES to buy cooking pans.

loans.use: To buy cooking pans

loans.name: Joery

texts.en: Joery works hard to support her family. Joery is widowed and has a dried fish business in the Philippines. Joery requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell to customers. Joery has been in this business for two years. In the future, Joery would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en: Nenita is 44 years old. She is married and has three children. With two children in school, Nenita works very hard to provide for them. Nenita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her store. Nenita has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items, such as snack foods, natural medicines and other grocery items.  In the future Nenita would like to save enough to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Remia

texts.en:
Remia works hard to support her family. Remia is married and has a pottery business in the Philippines. Remia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials needed for her pottery business. Remia has been in this business for 20 years now, and also earns additional income from selling guinamos (shrimp paste) and salt.

In the future, Remia would like to save enough to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

loans.name: Julia Susana

texts.es: Julia Susana, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su  compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella es una mujer ejemplar que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia junto con la ayuda de su esposo.  La señora Julia es muy conocida en la zona donde habita como una mujer trabajadora, responsable y emprendedora.
