Su principal fuente de ingresos es la agricultura, toda su vida han dependido de los frutos que la tierra les brinda  a partir de su trabajo. Así es como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar y  cubrir las principales necesidades de su familia. Muchas veces los ingresos que percibe con la agricultura no son suficientes para cubrir todas las necesidades de su hogar, esta fue la razón por la cual el año pasado solicitó un préstamo a INTEGRAL para hacer algunas mejoras a su vivienda, dicho préstamo no ha sido cancelado en su totalidad debido a algunos inconvenientes. Por lo anterior solicita refinanciamiento de crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en sus cultivos de maíz y frijoles ya que necesita invertir en los insumos agrícolas (semilla, abonos, insecticidas, etc.)  Necesarios para sacar una cosecha abundante y lograr cancelar el préstamo una vez sacada la cosecha. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que es la única fuente de ingresos que posee y es así como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar, confía en Dios que con su trabajo y la ayuda de esta institución logrará su sueño.
texts.en:
Julia Susana lives in her own house with her life companion and their children.  She’s an exemplary woman who with much effort has succeeded in moving her family forward with her husband’s help.  Julia is very well-known where she livesfor being a hardworking, responsible, enterprising woman.  Her main source of income in agriculture; her entire life she’s depended on the fruits the land produces as a result of her work.  This is how she manages to provide sustenance for her home and cover her family’s basic needs.

Often, income obtained from agriculture is insufficient to cover all her household’s expenses and this is why last year she asked INTEGRAL for a loan to make some home improvements.  This loan hasn’t been completely paid off due to some inconveniences which is why she’s now asking INTEGRAL to refinance the loan so that she can invest in her corn and bean crops because she needs to buy farm supplies (seeds, manure, insecticide, etc.) needed to produce an abundant harvest and to be able to pay off the loan once the harvest is gathered.  She hopes to have favorable results since this is the only source of income she has and the way she’s able to provide sustenance for her home.  She trusts in God that with her work and with help from Integral she’ll be able to reach her dream.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Pedro De Jesús

texts.es: Pedro de Jesús tiene 57 años de edad y habita en condiciones muy humildes en su hogar de residencia, junto a su esposa e hijos. Es un hombre muy honrado y trabajador, el cual a pesar de su avanzada edad no se cansa de trabajar y continuar luchando por sacar a delante a su querida familia.  Desde temprana edad aprendió a cultivar la tierra, dichos conocimientos son los que le han permitido llevar el sustento a su familia. Cada año realiza la siembra de maíz que es el principal grano básico cultivado en sus tierras, luego lo pone a la venta en los principales puntos de venta de su municipio, de esta forma logra cubrir las necesidades de su hogar.  Dado a que necesita invertir en los insumos agrícolas (semilla, abono, insecticida, etc.) necesarios para el cultivo del maíz ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar un crédito que le permita cubrir dichos costos y le ayude a impulsar su cosecha. Considera que de esta forma logrará obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita cubrir dicho crédito y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar como lo ha hecho hasta el momento.
texts.en: Pedro de Jesús is 57 years old and lives with his wife and children in humble conditions. He is a very honorable and hardworking man, who even despite his advancing age continues to work and fight for his dear family. From a young age Pedro de Jesús knew the land, and this knowledge has allowed him to provide sustenance to his family. Every year he plants corn, which is the principal grain in his region, then he sells his harvest at the principal locations in his town. Because he needs to invest in the necessary agricultural products (seeds, fertilizer, and insecticide, etc.) to grow corn he decided to approach INTEGRAL to apply for a loan. This will help him cover his cost and improve his yield. This way he feels that he will have another abundant harvest which will permit him to cover his loan and continue providing for his family as he always has.

loans.use: purchase seeds, fertilizer, insecticideP

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en: Emelia is from Solinog, Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She is 40 years old. Emelia is married and has 3 children. To make a living, Emelia owns and operates a retail store selling daily use products such as pancit, sardines, noodles, eggs, biscuits, candies, milk, shampoo, soap and toothpaste. Emelia has been engaged in her business for four years and earns 8,000PHP a month. In 2010, Emelia joined GDMPC. Emelia is requesting a loan of 20,000PHP which will be used to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es: A sus 59 años de edad Catalina no se cansa de trabajar y luchar por una mejor calidad de vida. Es una mujer increíble que a pesar de su avanzada edad sigue trabajando y apostando por mejores condiciones de vida. Ella habita junto a su esposo en casa de su propiedad y desde hace muchos años que se dedican a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Cada ano cultiva una manzana de tierra para lo cual es necesario pagar mano de obra e invertir en los insumos agrícolas necesarios para dicho cultivo. Dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Vale la pena mencionar que anteriormente ha recibido financiamientos por lo que ya cuenta con experiencia y conocimiento al respecto. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desean superarse haciendo lo mejor que pueden en sus cultivos.  Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en:
At the age of 59, Catalina does not tire of working and striving for a better quality of life.  She’s an unbelievable woman who despite her advanced age continues working and betting on better living conditions.  She and her husband live in a house they own and they have been working in agriculture for many years; it’s their main source of income.

Each year she cultivates a manzana [Central American unit of land measurement] of land and to do so she has to hire day laborers and buy farm supplies needed for said crops.  Because she does not have the necessary economic resources needed for this investment she decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan because it’s the only way she’ll be able to continue with her growing process.  It’s worth mentioning that she has received previous loans so she has experience and knowledge in this respect.

Like all farmers, she places her trust in agriculture because she has no other source of income and they want to get ahead doing the best they can for their crops.  She hopes to obtain an abundant harvest that will make it possible for her to provide daily bread for her home and to repay said loan.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es: Carlos Alfredo de 50 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijos. Es un hombre trabajador dedicado a su familia. Toda su vida ha trabajado en el campo, en  el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Como todo campesino cada año realiza la misma actividad: prepara la tierra, siembra la semilla, saca la cosecha y luego la pone a la venta de esta forma es como logra sacar los ingresos para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su esposa e hijos, pero esto no lo desmotiva a continuar trabajando para lograr su sueño de dar sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Espera que con la ayuda de esta institución, INTEGRAL, a la cual le solicita este crédito para invertir en abono para el cultivo de maíz y frijoles pueda lograr una cosecha abundante la cual le ayude a cubrir  dicho crédito y llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar ya que es la única forma que conoce de ganarse la vida a parte de su oficio de albañilería que por temporadas le salen sus trabajitos pero no es algo muy rentable. Confía en Dios que logrará su objetivo.
texts.en: Carlos Alfredo, 50, lives with his wife and children. He is a hard worker dedicated to his family. He has worked his whole life in the fields growing corn and beans. Like all farmers he goes through the same process every year: preparing the land, planting the seeds, harvest the crops, and later selling his crops. This is how he has provided for his household. He lives in very humble conditions with his family, but this doesn't discourage him from continuing to do his best to provide a better life for his children. He hopes that with the help of this institution INTEGRAL, who have provided him with a loan to invest in fertilizer, he will have an abundant harvest and be capable of covering the loan and provide for his family. This is his only way to earn money other than working as a mason. He occasionally has small jobs, but it is not very profitable. He trusts in God that he will achieve his objective.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Wilbert Elenilson

texts.es: Wilbert Elenilson tiene 26 años de edad y habita junto con su esposa y su pequeña hija de 4 años. El se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo. La agricultura es su principal fuente de ingresos y es lo que le permite dar estabilidad económica a su hogar.  Wilbert es un hombre responsable, trabajador y muy dedicado en sus tareas. Cuenta con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos ya que él es un hombre generoso, amable y carismático. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya comenzó y no posee los insumos agrícolas necesarios para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos solicita a INTEGRAL un refinanciamiento dado que ya posee un crédito con dicha institución el cual planea cancelar una vez sacada la cosecha, la cual confía será abundante y le dará para cubrir dicha deuda y llevar el alimento a su hogar ya que es así como mantiene  a su familia.
texts.en: Wilbert Elenilson is 26 years old and lives with his wife and his 4-year old daughter. He works growing corn, beans, and sorghum. Agriculture is his principal source of income, and this is how he provides economic stability in his household. Wilbert is a responsible, hardworking man who is very dedicated to his work. He has good references from his neighbors who note that he is a generous, kind, and charismatic individual. Because it is already planting season and he doesn't have the necessary supplies to maintain his crops he applied to INTEGRAL to refinance his loan. He already has a loan with the institution which he will pay back after the harvest, which he trusts will be abundant enough to pay back his debts and provide food for his family.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies (fertilizer, insecticide, seeds, etc.)

loans.name: Sulma Noemy

texts.es: Sulma Noemy tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus hijos. Como toda mujer salvadoreña, es una mujer ejemplar ya que hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su familia lo mejor. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para atender las tareas de su hogar y luego partir a su terreno para cultivar los principales granos básicos ya que la agricultura es su principal fuete de ingresos. Junto a su esposo trabajan muy duro para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Ella y su familia son muy conocidas y recomendadas en la zona donde habita, tanto por su persona como por su trabajo. Debido a que la temporada para siembra ya se hizo presente necesita invertir en los insumos agrícolas necesarios como abonos, insecticidas y semillas ya que son indispensables para obtener una buena cosecha. Por lo anterior solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos para hacer dicha inversión. Vale la pena mencionar que el pasado fue cliente de esta institución y cuenta con buenas calificaciones. Sin duda alguna con la cosecha logrará  cubrir el crédito y continuar llevando el sustento a su querida familia.
texts.en:
Sulma Noemy, 47, lives in a house she owns with her family composed of her husband and children.  Like all Salvadoran women, she’s an exemplary woman who does everything in her reach to give her family the best.  She rises very early each morning to tend to her household chores and then heads out to her fields to grow basic grains since agriculture is her main source of income.  She and her husband work hard together to give their children better living conditions.  

She and her family are very well-known in the area where they live as people and because of her work.  Because the planting season has arrived she needs to invest in necessary farm supplies like manure, insecticide and seeds that are indispensable for obtaining a good harvest.  

In light of the above she’s asked INTEGRAL for this loan because she does not have the economic resources to make said investment.  It’s worth mentioning that she was a client of INTEGRAL in the past and has good grades.  No doubt she’ll be able to repay the loan with her harvest and continue to provide her beloved family with sustenance.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is 50 years old and married with four children. Rosie works very hard to provide for them.

Rosie runs a general store in the Philippines.   She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Rosie has been in this business for three years, and she sells a variety of items, such as canned goods, noodles, detergent, and other groceries. 

In the future Rosie would like to save enough to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Magelyn

texts.en:
Magelyn is 44 years old and married, with two children. She works very hard to provide for the needs of her family. 

She is an Avon cosmetics products distributor in the Philippines.   Because of insufficient capital, she is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000. She wants to buy additional stock of Avon products to sell, such as like lipsticks, pressed powders, lotions, and perfumes. 

She has been in this business for nine years, and she is earning an income of PHP 4,000 monthly. 

Magelyn says she will do everything just to provide the needs of her family, especially to meet her responsibility as a mother of her two kids in terms of education and daily needs. 

In the future, Magelyn would like to save more funds for their needs and alleviate her family from poverty.

loans.use: to buy lipsticks, pressed powders, lotions, and perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Fermín Del Carmen

texts.es: Fermín del Carmen  de 65 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su hijo. El se dedica al cultivo  de maíz y frijol, desde hace muchos años. Es  un hombre increíble que a pesar de su avanzada edad no se cansa de trabajar. Día con día se levanta muy temprano para dedicarse a sus cultivos y así lograr una cosecha abundante. El señor Fermín es un hombre que ha trabajado mucho durante toda su vida, eso lo ha hecho acreedor de una pensión que aunque no es mucho lo que recibe le ayuda con su economía.  Con los ingresos que recibe de la agricultura logra cubrir el resto de necesidades y ayudar a su familia, vale la pena mencionar que él es un hombre de trabajo, responsable y dedicado en lo que hace.  Dado que la temporada para la siembra ya se hizo presente ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para hacerlo por su cuenta. Desea invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: abono, insecticidas, y semillas. Espera tener resultados favorables, que le permitan logar su sueño, de continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar y haciendo lo que tanto le gusta.
texts.en: Fermín del Carmen  is 65 years old.  He lives in the house he owns with his son. He has grown corn and beans for several years. He is an incredible man, who despite his advaned years doesn't tire of working. Day after day he gets up very early to work on his crops to have an abundant harvest. Fermín is a man who has worked hard his whole life. This has made him the beneficiary of a pension. It isn't alot but what he gets helps his finances. With the income he receives from the farming he is able to cover the rests of his necesities and help his family. It is worth mentioning that he is a working man who is responsible and dedicated to what he does. Since planting time is already here, he has decided to ask for this loan from INTEGRAL. He doesn't have the financial resources to do it on his own. He wants to invest in buying agricultural materials such as: fertilizer, insecticides and seeds. He hopes to have favorable results that will allow him to achieve his dream: to keep supporting his home and doing what he likes so much.

loans.use: to buy fertilzer, seeds, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Elsa Mirian

texts.es: Elsa Mirian tiene 31 años de edad y habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus hijos. Junto a su esposo trabaja duramente en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles desde hace muchos años. La agricultura es su principal fuente de ingresos. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y sobre todo responsable. Desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana se levanta para poder cubrir sus responsabilidades del hogar y luego ayudar a su esposo en las actividades agrícolas. Es así como año con año realizan la misma actividad de sembrar los granos básicos, sacar la cosecha y posteriormente ponerla a la venta. Su familia es lo más preciado y es por ella que trabaja duramente ya que su sueño es brindar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida a las que ella y su esposo han tenido acceso. Para este año han decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL ya que necesita invertir en los insumos agrícolas  (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para impulsar la cosecha ya que desea tener una cosecha abundante la cual le permita cancelar el crédito y continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en: Elsa Mirian is 31 and lives with her husband and children. Alongside her husband, she has worked tirelessly growing corn and beans for many years. Agriculture is their principal source of income. She is ambitious, hardworking, and above all responsible. She wakes up very early in the morning to take care of her household responsibilities and then heads out to help her husband in agricultural activities. Year by year they go through the same process of planting basic grains, harvesting crops, and then selling them. Her family is precious to her, and they are why she works hard. Her dream is to provide her children with a better quality of life than the one she and her husband have had access to. This year they have decided to apply for a loan from INTEGRAL because they need to invest in the necessary agricultural supplies (fertilizer, seeds, insecticide, etc.). She hopes to have an abundant harvest which will allow her to pay back the loan and provide for her family.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies (fertilizer, seeds, insecticide, etc.)

loans.name: Pech

texts.en:
Pech’s business is direct-selling, operating a small general store at home, located in Baray district, Kompong Tom province. From this business, Pech is able to generate income of KHR 6,000. She enjoys her business because she likes meeting and chatting with her loyal customers every day. 

She is 23 years old and married, with a young child not yet in school. She plans to send him to school next two years when he becomes six years of  age. Pech’s husband is in the business of trading firewood as additional income when he is available from his rice farming business.

Pech is now asking for a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase a plowing machine for farming.   

Also, in Cambodia a plowing machine can be connected with a trailer at the back for hauling items from place to place, such as bags of rice, corn, vegetables, and firewood, to the marketplaces. So it will help Pech’s family in developing their businesses in the future. 

She is appreciative of the loan help.

loans.use: to purchase a plowing machine for farming.

loans.name: Adelinda

texts.en:
Adelinda works hard to support her family. Adelinda is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Adelinda requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Adelinda has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Adelinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: José Eliseo

texts.es: José Eliseo tiene 20 años de edad y habita junto con sus padres en casa de su propiedad. El se dedica al cultivo de maíz, desde muy joven aprendió a cultivar la tierra y ahora es lo que le permite ganarse el pan de cada día y ayudar a su familia con la economía del hogar.  Es un joven muy responsable, trabajador y honesto. Su deseo es mejorar sus condiciones de vida y eso lo motiva a trabajar duramente para lograr su fin. En vista de que la temporada para la siembra ya se hizo presente solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar el abono necesario para impulsar su milpa y poder  obtener una cosecha abundante y así poder lograr su sueño y cancelar este crédito ya que es la única fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta. Espera que con esta ayuda y con su trabajo logre su objetivo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: José Eliseo is 20 years old and lives with his parents in a home they own. He grows corn. When he was very young he learned how to cultivate the land and now it allows him to earn his daily bread and help his family with household expenses. He is a responisble, hardworking and honest young man. He wants to improve his quality of life and this motivates him to work hard to meet his goals. Since planting time is here he is asking for this loan from INTEGRAL to buy the fertilizer he needs to grow the corn and be able to have an abundant harvest and in this way acheive his dream, paying off the loan with the income he has. He hopes that with this help and with his work he attains his goal of improving his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Susana Del Carmen

texts.es: Susana del Carmen de 34 años de edad, habita con esposo e hijos en casa de su  propiedad. La señora Susana es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y muy emprendedora. Desde hace algunos anos decidió dedicarse al negocio ya que los ingresos percibidos por su esposo no lograba cubrir los gastos del hogar.  Se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde habita. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos razón por la cual sus vecinos la prefieren. Como toda mujer emprendedora a decidido invertir en el cuidado de su ganado ya que  de eso depende su negocio. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de una vaca lechera que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en: Susana del Carmen is 34 and lives with her husband and children. Mrs. Susana is a hardworking, responsible, and ambitious woman. For a few years she has run a business because her husband's income was not enough to cover their household expenses. She works producing and selling dairy products in her community. She has a very good client base because she knew how to gain their trust. She offers quality and good prices for her products, which is why her neighbors prefer her products. As a businesswoman she has decide to invest in the care of her cattle because they are what her business depends on. She has decided to apply for a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase vitamins for her cattle and to purchase a milk cow to grow her business. With these improvements she hopes to obtain favorable results and continue to provide economic support to her household, which still needs it.

loans.use: purchase vitamins for cattle and milk cows

loans.name: Filda

texts.en:
Filda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a candle making business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more materials needed for her candle making business.

NWTF is relisting Filda's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more materials needed for her candle making business

loans.name: Por Un Futuro Mejor  (Paute) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Por un Futuro Mejor está formado por 8 socias, quienes viven en diferentes lugares del cantón Paute que eestá ubicado en el sector nor-oriental de la provincia del Azuay a una distancia de 42 Km de la ciudad de Cuenca, su población es una de las más laboriosas y emprendedoras de la provincia de Azuay, cuentan con gastronomía típica, sus ferias de los domingo son llenas de color por la vestimenta de su gente, tienen una gran producción frutícola y también cuentan con producción de flores que  hacen de este cantón un verdadero jardín, se cultiva para exportación rosas de la más alta calidad. Su gente es amable y muy gentil, mantienen aun la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la señora Marcia, tiene 24 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 7 años de edad que estudia en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora conduciendo un bus, la casa en la que vive es de propiedad.

La Señora Marcia se dedica al cuidado de su casa, ella es  profesional en la rama del estilismo y tiene su gabinete de belleza hace 5 años, labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo. 

Es socia del banco comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de tintes y otros productos de belleza para continuar con su negocio.
 
Su meta es tener otro negocio propio.

La foto pequeña es de dos socias que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomó la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The Por un Futuro Mejor [For a Better Future] communal bank is made up of 8 members. They live in different places in the Paute canton, which is located in the north-eastern sector of the Azuay province, 42 km from the city of Cuenca. Its population is one of the most hardworking and enterprising of the Azuay province. They have a traditional cuisine and its Sunday fairs are full of color and the traditional garb of its people. They have a lot of fruit production and they also produce flowers, which makes this canton a true garden where the jighest quality roses are grown for export. It's people are friendly and kind. They still keep the culture and traditions of their people. 

One of the members of this group is Marcia. She is 24 years old, married and has one 7 year old son who goes to a local school. Her husband is a driver by profession and drives a bus. They own the house they live in. 

Marcia takes care of her home. She is also a professional stylist and has had a beauty salon for 5 years. She works Sunday to Sunday with no set schedule. 

She has been a member of the communal bank for 3 years and will invest her new loan in buying hair color and other beauty products to continue her business.
 
Her goal is to have her own business. 

The small photo is of two members who couldn't be there when this group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy hair color and other beauty products.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is from the small village of San Luis. She has had a retail store based in her home for four years and four months. The daily net profit of 450 PHP is just enough to cover the cost of her family's daily meals.

To improve her income from the store, Marivic is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase additional stock of items such as biscuits, soft drinks, cooking oil, sugar, and other ingredients to resell. She is patient and determined to improve her business to supplement the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of items to resell

loans.name: Aniceta

texts.en:
Aniceta is from the village of Capellan province of Isabela. She is 54 years old and married, with two adult children. 

Aniceta owns and operates a specialized retail store, selling fruits and vegetables in the local community. With her vending business, she earns about 3,000 PHP a month. 

Aniceta is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 47 years old and married, with four children.

Rosalinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

Rosalinda has borrowed and repaid no fewer than 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 18 years, and she also earns an income from fish vending.

Rosalinda aspires to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: May

texts.en:
May is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy utensils and ingredients for her business.

May has been in this business for 4 years. May earns additional income by raising livestock.

May has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy utensils and ingredients for her business

loans.name: Félix Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Félix tiene 42 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos, dos de ellos son varones mayores de edad que son los que necesitan tener los recursos para llevar a cabo y a tiempo su trabajos y al mismo tiempo tener como ganar dinero realizando días de trabajo a los vecinos. Es jornalero desde que era un adolescente, por ese motivo no asistió a la escuela, tiene 32 años de desempeñar esta actividad.

El préstamo que esta solicitando don Félix, es para comprar dos bueyes para trabajar, ya que cada vez que los necesita para cultivar la milpa tiene que buscar a alguien para que se los alquile a $30 dólares los 7,000 metros cuadrados de terreno y él cultiva 28,000 metros cuadrados, por lo que se ahorraría unos buenos dólares.

Al tener los bueyes propios, realizara los trabajos cuando él los necesite y también podrá realizar trabajos de otras personas, por lo que tendrá ingresos que le permitan comprar más alimento para su familia y enviar a la escuela a su hija. Lo que más desea es que su hija sea una profesional ya que él no lo pudo realizar.
texts.en:
Felix is 42 years old and is married with three children. Two of them are male that are no longer of dependent age that need the resources to carry out their work on time and at the same time have as their earnings the work they have done for neighbors. He has been a day laborer since he was an adolescent and could not attend school. He has 32 years of experience performing this work. 

The loan that Felix is requesting is to buy two oxen for work because every time that he needs them to cultivate the corn fields he must search for someone that can rent them to him at a rate of $30 dollars for 7,000 square meters of land. Felix plants an area of 28,000 square meters so this would save him a lot of money. 

By having his own oxen, he will fulfill his work when he needs to and will also be able to fulfill other people's work. With this he will have an income that will allow him to buy more nourishment for his family and send his daughter to school. What he hopes for the most is that his daughter becomes a professional since he could not do so himself.

loans.use: to buy two oxen for work.

loans.name: Maura

texts.en:
This is Maura, She previously accessed a 15,000 PHP loan that she used to buy more quantities of products like meat, rice, vegetables, condiments, and seasonings. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in her family's personal, household, and business expenditures.
 
She would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan for her to purchase raw ingredients and supplies needed in her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Maura hopes to be able to expand her business soon, just as she hopes to support her children's schooling up to the college level, and to pay for her house in full. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for products and inventory items needed for her food stall

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 39 years old and a single mother of two.  

She runs a bakery to earn a living.  She has nine years of experience in the business.  She also does farming to supplement her income.  

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has improved her business because she has been trained in business management skills.

She requests a loan of 20,000 KES to buy baking ingredients, such as wheat flour, cooking fat, and sugar.

loans.use: To buy baking ingredients, such as wheat flour, cooking fat, and sugar

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 10 years.

Rosalinda requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

In the future, Rosalinda would like to save enough money to buy a new fishing boat for her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 43 years old and married, with six children.

Teresita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more grocery items to sell in her store.

Teresita has been in this business for 11 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Teresita aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell at her store.

loans.name: Dilnoza

texts.en:
Dilnoza has the ability to sew national womens' dresses. She is a 19-year-old woman who is married but has no children. Her husband is a kind man who tries to help her with all deals. He is a photographer. The fast development of the modern world makes the couple more progressive. Dilnoza tries to provide her family with a better quality of life. That’s why she is going to organize her own business deal for sewing national dresses, as she doesn't have a job yet. 

She studied at the course, 'To get success', from a women's organization and got a certificate for her business skills. She wants to buy a plastic booth for her workshop. Her workshop will be located in the centre of her town. Thanks to her good services, she will manage to gain many customers. From the profits of her business, her family’s quality of life will improve. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 USD to buy a sewing machine and a plastic booth. She promises to make her payments on time. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and plastic booth

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en: Josefina, 53 years of age, is married and has three children. She has operated her retail store in their village for almost three years and she earns approximately PHP 300 a day. She wants to request a loan from Kiva lenders for PHP 40,000 to purchase noodles, condiments, assorted breads, and curls to sell in her retail store. She is patient and determined to improve her business to supplement the needs of her family. Her profits will be used as additional working capital for her business.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, condiments, assorted breads, and curls to sell in her retail store

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary practices both poultry and dairy farming to earn a living. Besides this, she also sells clothes. She used her previous loan of 20,000 KES to buy more chicks. The chicks matured and she sold them, making more profits. She has requested for another loan of 40,000 KES to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Wangui

texts.en:
Wangui is 38 years old, married, and blessed with four school-going children. She has been in the poultry business for two years and earns a monthly income of KES 10,200.

This her first loan from KADET LTD, which she intends to use to purchase more chicks to rear and sell later at a profit. The anticipated profits will be used to buy a plot to develop.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks to rear and sell later at a profit

loans.name: Pan De Azúcar  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Pan de Azúcar está formado por 5 socias y 1 socio quienes viven en la ciudad de Cuenca que es la capital de la provincia del Azuay, es reconocida como la "Atenas del Ecuador" y la ciudad cultural del país. Cuenca es una ciudad con mucha producción artesanal. Su gente es amable, cálida y gentil como nuestras socias quienes se dedican a laborar  en diferentes actividades las mismas que les permiten ayudar y solventar los gastos de sus hogares.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Jesenia, tiene 19 años, es casada y está embarazada de su primer hijo. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace 4 años, este negocio le permite solventar algunos gastos de su hogar y también esta actividad le ha permitido costearse sus estudios los cuales por el momento están interrumpidos por su embarazo.
 
El dinero de este crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos y va a pagar la matrícula de su colegio para culminar sus estudios. La banca comunal le gusta porque los créditos le dan la oportunidad de crecer en su negocio para salir adelante conjuntamente con su familia.

Su meta es culminar sus estudios secundarios.
 
La foto pequeña adjunta es de una de las socias que por motivos personales no pudo estar presente cuando se tomó la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank Pan de Azúcar members are five women and one man. They live in the city of Cuenca, the capital of the Azuay province. Cuenca is known as the "Athens of Ecuador" and is the cultural center of the country.  It has a lot of artisanry production. it's people are friendly, warm, and kind just like the group members who make their livings in different businesses. These businesses allow them to support and pay for their household expenses. 

One of the members of this group is Jesenia. She is 19 years old and is married and pregnant with her first child. They do not own their own house which is why they live in a rented home. Her husband works as a private employee and she has made a living selling cosmetics for the past four years. The business allows her to pay for some of the household expenses as well as allowing her to pay her own way through her studies, which she has put on hold during her pregnancy. 

She will use the money from this loan to invest in the purchase of cosmetics as well as paying for school registration to finish her studies. She likes the communal bank because the loans giver her opportunity to grow her business in order to get ahead along with her family. Her goal is to finish her secondary education.

The small photo attached is one of the members who was unable, for personal reasons, to be present when the photo of the group was taken.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and to pay for school registration.

loans.name: Argelio

texts.es: Argelio de cincuenta y tres años de edad  vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y tiene varios años de desempeñarse en la agricultura, desde muy joven aprendió el oficio y con el tiempo ha obtenido experiencia muy valiosa que le ha dado la oportunidad de tener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva esta ubicado en una zona accesible apto para la siembra,  comercia en todos los alrededores  y ya tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y aprecios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Argelio es un hombre admirable le gusta luchar por sus metas y piensa trabajar duro hasta alcanzar ese futuro mas prospero, el ultimo año perdió toda la cosecha y en este periodo de siembra quiere recuperarse pero necesita de capital para la inversión en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, herbicida, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Argelio tiene buenas referencias de pago y asegura que podrá pagar la deuda y además tiene la confianza que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Argelio, fifty-three, lives with his partner and their children.  He has had some years in farming and grows corn.  He learned the skills when he was very young and over time has acquired valuable experience which has give him the opportunity to always have better harvests.  The land that he cultivates is in an accessible area good for planting.  He sells his crops in the area and already has many customers since all that he produces is top quality and at reasonable prices.  Also his service is excellent.
Argelio is an admirable man who likes to fight for his goals and he plans to work hard to have a more prosperous future.  Last year he lost all his crops and he wants to recuperate his losses during this season.  He needs capital to invest in supplies and that is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow him to buy corn seeds, herbicides, insecticides, tools, etc.
Argelio has good payment references and he promises to cancel the debt.  He is also confident that he will be able to raise the standard of living for his family.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, herbicides, insecticides and tools

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
This is Yolanda, 58, resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Domingo and they have two children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Yolanda operates a piggery. She earns by selling live hogs to meat dealers. Sometimes they have the pigs slaughtered and sold in the market. Aside from this she also cooks breakfast meals for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 1,200 in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 20,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy feed and additional hogs. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Yolanda hopes that her business will continue to be successful. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for feed and additional hogs needed in her business

loans.name: Aurora

texts.en: To make a living, Aurora has operated her general store for more than three years. She earns PHP 300 each day through the business, which is being rolled into revolving capital to maintain the business. She is 48 years old and is married with three school-aged children. To expand her retailing, she is taking out this loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to purchase stock, such as canned goods, groceries, noodles, shampoo, and spices to sell. Aurora hopes to further grow her general store and to increase her income, which will secure her family's future and the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase stock to sell

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 36 years old and married with 2 children. With both children in school, Rosalie works very hard to provide for them.

Rosalie runs a variety store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her variety store.

Rosalie has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items, such as snack foods, soap, and other grocery items. 

In the future Rosalie would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her variety store

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a firewood retail business in the Philippines.

Norma requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more firewood to sell. She has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future, Norma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Rosalina works hard to support her family.

She has a carabao business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling ready-to-wear clothing. Rosalina is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF to buy additional livestock.

Rosalina has been sustaining her business activities through the past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock

loans.name: Uselbia

texts.en:
Uselbia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buying-and-selling of vegetables business in the Philippines.

Uselbia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell. She has been in this business for 2 years.

In the future, Uselbia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 40 years old and married, with five children.  

She sells shoes to earn a living.  She has engaged in the business for five years.  She has grown her business since she joined Faulu Kenya because she has been trained on business management skills.

She hopes to expand her business in the future.  She needs 20,000 KES to buy more shoes.

loans.use: To buy more shoes to stock.

loans.name: Helenda

texts.en:
Helenda works hard to support her family. She is single, and she has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

Helenda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy materials for her abaca weaving business.

She has been in this business for six years.

In the future, Helenda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for her abaca weaving business.

loans.name: Ashurali

texts.ru:
Ашурали проживает в городе Дангара. Ему 44 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его дети учатся в средней школе. Жена Ашурали занимается домашним хозяйством. Сам он занимается торговлей. 
Ашурали арендует торговую точку на центральном рынке, где оптом продает овощи и масло. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 20 лет. 
Ашурали берет кредит для покупки картошки.
texts.en: Ashurali lives in the town of Dangara. He is 44 years old. He is married, with five children. His children attend secondary school. Ashurali's wife is a homemaker. As to Ashurali, he works as a vendor. He rents a sales stand at the central market, from where he sells vegetables and vegetable oil wholesale. He has been in this business for 20 years. Ashurali is taking out a loan to buy potatoes.

loans.use: to buy potatoes.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is married, 43 years old, and has four children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Virginia has a food production/sales business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business.

Virginia has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Raúl Esteban

texts.es: Raúl Esteban de sesenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, desde muy joven empezó a dedicarse a la agricultura y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en el campo la cual le permite obtener las mejores cosechas para después ponerlas a la venta, el terreno de su cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia  en todos los alrededores de la comunidad esperando satisfacer todas las necesidades de su clientela las personas prefieren  sus productos porque son de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un servicio excepcional; Raúl es un hombre admirable y no se cansa de trabajar duro para salir adelante y cumplir sus objetivos, cada año se prepara para la cosecha y en esta ocasión quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital suficiente para la compra de insumos por eso se decidió acercarse  a INTRGRAL y solicitarle un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, abono, insecticida, etc. Raúl Esteban tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral  intachable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo tiene la esperanza que podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Raul Esteban is sixty-one years old and lives with his life partner.  He devotes himself to the cultivation corn and sorghum cultivation.  He began working in agriculture since a very young age.  This has given him extensive experience in the field so that he is able to yield the best crops to sell afterwards.  The land that he cultivates is located in an area of ​​high agricultural yield.  There is business in all of the surrounding community and he hopes to satisfy all of his customer's needs.  People prefer his products because they are of the finest quality and at affordable prices.  In addition his service is exceptional. Raul is an admirable man who does not tire of working hard to get ahead and achieve his goals.  

Each year he prepares for the harvest, and this time he wants to increase his production but he needs enough capital to purchase supplies. So he decided to approach and request a credit from INTRGRAL in order to purchase corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.. Raul Esteban has good references for payment, and his impeccable moral character ensures that he will repay the debt within the established time period.  At the same time he hopes that he can offer his family a full, satisfying life.

loans.use: to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, and insecticide

loans.name: Eloy

texts.es: ELOY TIENE 73 AÑOS DE EDAD ES CONVIVIENTE Y TIENE 5 HIJOS. VIVE CON SU ESPOSA EN UNA COMUNIDAD PEQUEÑA EN LA  ZONA RURAL DEL DISTRITO DE CAYALTI EN EL NORTE DE PERU. EL ES UNA PERSONA QUE APESAR DE SU EDAD, SE MANTIENE MUY BIEN Y TIENE MUCHAS ENERGIAS PARA TRABAJAR EN EL CAMPO; UNA LABOR QUE ES SU PASION. EL SE DEDICA A LA CRIANZA Y VENTA DE CERDOS Y ANIMALES MENORES,ADEMÁS A LA SIEMBRA Y VENTA DE ALFALFA DESDE HACE  MAS DE 20 AÑOS. ESTO LO HACE EN SU PROPIO DOMICILIO EL CUAL HA TRABAJANDO GRADUALMENTE PARA TRANSFORMALO EN SU NEGOCIO. PRECISAMENTE ELOY BUSCA UN PRESTAMO PARA SEGUIR CONSOLIDANDO SU NEGOCIO. EN PARTICULAR, SOLICITA  EL CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA ALIMENTO PARA SUS ANIMALES,DE ESTAMANERA  HACER CRECER SU NEGOCIO Y PODER MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE  VIDA.
texts.en: Eloy is 73 years old. He has a common-law wife and five children. He lives with his wife in a small community in the rural zone of the district of Cayalti in the north of Peru. He is a person who, in spite of his age, maintains himself very well and has a lot of energy to work in the field, a work that is his passion. He raises and sells pigs and small animals. In addition, he has been planting and selling alfalfa for more than 20 years. He does this at his own residence, which he has worked on gradually to transform it into his business. Eloy is now looking for a loan precisely in order to continue strengthening his business. In particular, he is applying for the loan in order to buy feed for his animals and in this way to make his business grow and be able to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy feed for his animals, and in this way grow his business

loans.name: Mouminatou

texts.fr:
Le BV de Mlomp a été inauguré le 03 juin 2010. Tous les membres habitent le même village et sont solidairement liées. Leur activité principale est le commerce de détail.
Mouminatou est âgée de 42 ans. elle est célibataire et mère d'un garçon. Elle s'active dans la vente de poissons secs et de savon. 
Avec ce prêt de 395.000 Francs CFA, elle compte acheter 10 sacs de poissons secs pour une valeur de 175.000 et 45 paquets de savons pour 202.500 Frs. Les bénéfices serviront à la prise en charge de son fils et à augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
The 'banc villageois' of Mlomp was inaugurated on June 3, 2010. Its members all live in the same village and are linked in solidarity. Their main work involves retail commerce. 

Mouminatou is 42 years old, unmarried, and the mother of one boy. She is active in selling dried fish and soap.

With this loan of 395,000 francs CFA, she intends to buy ten sacks of dried fish at 175,000 francs and 45 packets of soap at 202,500 francs. The profits will be used to support her son and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy dried fish and soap to resell

loans.name: Maura

texts.es: Maura tiene 31 años de edad es conviviente y con 1 hijo a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo. La casa está ubicada en el Dist Tambogrande al Norte del Peru. Ellos viven en la parte  rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz. Ella es una persona la cual siempre quiere darle una imagen a su hijo que las mujeres pueden tambien ser una parte importante de la familia en cuanto al aporte economico y es muy emprendedora. Por esto identifico el potential de dedicarse a la venta de productos de belleza de la línea ESIKA, AVON DUPREE Y ROPA, en la cuales realiza 2 campañas por mes y cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona. Ya tiene más de 6 años de experiencia en dicho negocio el cual ha demonstrado tener gran acojida. Su conviviente es agricultor, arrendando terreno para sembrar maíz. También es dueño de 2 máquinas desgranadoras, las cuales le generan ingresos semanales. Para seguir consolidando su negocio, Maura busca un credito con Edpyme Alternativa. En particular, el destino del crédito será para la compra de mercadería en ropa, pues por estas fechas los pedidos aumentan considerablemente.
texts.en:
Maura is 31 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and her son. The house is located in the Tambogrande District in northern Peru. They live in the rural part of the district, but she has electricity. 

Maura is a person who always wants to give her son the idea that women can be an important part of the family, too, with respect to economic support, and she is very enterprising. That's why she identified the potential of a career selling the Esika, Avon, and Duprée lines of beauty products and clothing; she does two sales campaigns per month and has established customers in the area. She already has more than six years of experience in the business, which has proven to be well-received. 

Maura's husband is a farmer, leasing land to plant corn. He is also the owner of two corn shellers that generate weekly income. 

To continue consolidating her business, Maura is seeking a loan with Edpyme Alternativa. In particular, this loan will be destined for the purchase of clothing merchandise, since lately the orders are increasing considerably.

loans.use: to purchase clothing merchandise, since lately orders are increasing considerably.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 70 kg of fertilizers and to pay workers

loans.name: Dianke's Group

texts.fr:
Le Groupe Barandama est créé le 04 Décembre 2009. Tous les membres habitent le même village et sont liées par la caution solidaire. Leur activité principale est le commerce de détail.
Mme Dianké est l'emprunteur en vedette, elle est située à droite de la photo avec la main lévée. Elle est âgée de 60 ans, veuve avec 6 enfants (3 filles et 3 garçons).
Mme Dianké va acheter de poissons secs et de l'huile de palme pour revendre dans le village et les environs. Avec le bénéfices, elle compte assurer la nourriture, la santé et la scolarité de ses enfants et augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
The group Barandama was created on December 4, 2009. Its members all live in the same village and are bound in solidarity mutually guaranteeing each other. Their main work involves retail commerce. 

Ms. Dianké is the featured borrower. She is at the right in the photo with her hand raised. She is 60 years old and a widow, and she has six children (3 girls and 3 boys). 

Ms. Dianké is going to buy dried fish and palm oil to resell in and around the village. With the profits, she plans on ensuring her children's food, healthcare, and education and on increasing her savings.

loans.use: to buy dried fish and palm oil to resell

loans.name: Suzane Patience

texts.fr: Patience est une jeune femme de 27 ans célibataire, sans enfant. Elle ouvert un Cybercafé qu'elle gère dpuis un an. son activté fonctionne à merveille, mais elle a juste un manquement qui lui fait perdre beaucoup de clients la mauvaise connexion Internet et l’insuffisance des machines dans sa petite structure. Pourtant sa clientèle s'agrandit avec le temps. Elle perd certains de ses  clients qui sont obligés d'aller à sa concurrence à cause des machines et de la connexion. Grâce à ce crédit, elle pourra enfin se la procurer quelques ordinateurs bon marché et changer de connexion. Ceci satisfera  sa clientèle en les évitant le déplacement vers d'autres cybercafés voisins et elle aussi. Le bénéfice que lui apportera ce crédit l'aidera à accroitre son activitéavec le temps.
texts.en:
Patience is a young woman, 27 years old, unmarried, and without children. She opened an internet cafe she has been running for a year. Business is booming, but she lacks something which is causing her to lose many customers. It is a bad internet connection and insufficient computers in her small space. However, her customer base has grown with time. She loses some of her customers who are compelled to go to her competition because of the computers and the connection. 

Thanks to this loan, she will finally be able to acquire some inexpensive computers and to switch connections. This will satisfy her customers by saving them from a trip to neighboring internet cafes.  Her, too. The profit that this loan will bring in will help her to grow her business over time.

loans.use: to buy computers and to switch connections

loans.name: Abatuhurana Group

texts.fr:
Revocate fait partie du groupe  Abatuhurana et  habite à  Gitega. Elle a 24 ans et est mariée à Donatien qui travaille dans un moulin. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants dont 2 étudient.
Elle prend  soin de 2 enfants orphelins.

Elle fait le commerce d’huile de palme et de farine  depuis  8 ans. 

Elle est à son quatrième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité d’huile de palme et de  farine, à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  acheter un véhicule  grâce au profit de son commerce.
texts.en:
Revocate is part of the group Abatuhurana and lives in Gitega. She is 24 years old and married to Donatien, who works at a mill. Together they have two children, both in school. She takes care of two orphaned children.

She has been doing commerce in palm oil and flour for eight years. 

She is on her fourth loan with Turame. With this KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and buy a large amount of palm oil and flour to resell, so as to earn more. 

In the next few years, she would like to buy a vehicle thanks to the profits from her commerce.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy a large amount of palm oil and flour to resell

loans.name: Huong

texts.en: Huong is 32 years old. She has two children who are studying in primary school. She is a carpentry worker. From her job, she gains 4,500,000 VND a month. She has taken part in a crediting program of SEDA since 2010. During the last cycle, she borrowed 7,392,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 8,288,000 VND to make furniture to sell. She hopes to open a carpentry studio for her children and teach them how to do carpentry.

loans.use: to make furniture to sell.

loans.name: Umwete I Group

texts.fr:
Antoinette fait partie du groupe Umwete I et  habite à  Gitega. Elle a 45 ans et est mariée à Bernard un commerçant de boutique(savons,allumettes,...). Ensemble ils ont 7 enfants dont 3 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique  depuis  20 ans. 

Elle est à son dixième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  des articles divers (savons,allumettes,...) à revendre dans sa boutique, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  voir ses clients augmenter.
texts.en:
Antoinette is part of the group Umwete I and lives in Gitega. She is 45 years old and married to Bernard, a shopkeeper (soaps, matches,…) Together they have seven children, of whom three are in school. 

She has been a shopkeeper for twenty years. 

She is on her tenth loan with Turame. With this KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and buy various goods (soaps, matches,…) to resell in her shop, so as to earn more. 

In the next few years, she would like to see her customer base grow.

loans.use: to increase her capital and to buy various goods (soaps, matches,...) to resell in her shop

loans.name: Douglas Alberto

texts.es: Douglas Alberto de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, desde joven se ha trabajado en la agricultura y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar día con día su labor y al mismo tiempo obtener buenas cosechas, el terreno de cultivo es apto para la siembra y tiene suelo fértil, todo lo producido lo vende en los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que  necesitan a precios realmente accesibles además con un buen servicio; Douglas es un hombre emprendedor, decidido y siempre esta motivado a salir adelante, para él lo mas importante es su grupo familiar por eso lucha por alcanzar el éxito, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y perdió las ganancias, por eso en esta  cosecha quiere aprovechar y aumentar su producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, insecticida, herbicida, abono, etc. Douglas Alberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y asegura q podrá cancelar la deuda y además tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Douglas Alberto is thirty-five years old and lives with his life partner and three children in their own house. He earns his living growing corn. From a very young age he has worked in agriculture and he has a lot of experience which helps him to improve day by day in his work and to obtain good harvests. The crop land is good for sowing and has fertile soil. He sells everything he produces in the outskirts of the community and already has many customers since people prefer to buy from him because he sells everything they need, at accessible prices and provides good customer service.

Douglas is an enterprising and determined man and is always motivated to move forward. For him the most important thing is his family, for which he fights to succeed.  

During the last crop season he incurred some losses and he lost income. For this reason during this harvest he wants to make the most of it and increase production but he needs capital and for this reason he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow him to buy corn seeds, insecticide, herbicide, manure etc. Douglas Alberto has good payment references and promises that he will be able to pay back the debt and has faith that he will be able to provide his family with good living conditions.

loans.use: corn seeds, insecticide, herbicide and fertilizer.

loans.name: Señor De La Vara Group

texts.es:
La socia Benedicta tiene 46 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la hermosa provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal de socia Benedicta es la crianza de gallinas, pollos  y cuyes. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Además, Benedicta también se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche y otras cosas más. Ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes donde tiene mercadería surtida. En esta oportunidad Benedicta requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar. (Las socia  Benedicta está levantando la mano en la fotografía).

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Señor de la Vara” en la provincia de Calca del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de ropa, crianza de pollos, venta de verduras, venta de abarrotes y otros brindan servicio de transportes y llamadas a celulares y 

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (Las personas que aperecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía llegaron tarde a la reunión del banco comunal). 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
The communal bank member Benedicta is 46 years. She lives in a free union relationship, from which she has four children. She now lives in the beautiful province of Calca in the department of Cusco. Her principal business activity is raising hens, chickens, and guinea pigs. She has had this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for her. In addition, Benedicta also sells basic food products such as rice, sugar, milk and other items. She has a little grocery store where she stocks her merchandise. Benedicta now needs the loan to buy sacks of rice and sugar. (Communal bank member Benedicta is raising her hand in the photograph.)

This group consists of neighbors and friends who formed the communal bank "Señor de la Vara" in the province of Calca in the department of Cusco. It is made up of people who at every moment seek opportunities to advance and with their daily effort to give a better future to their children. The members' business activities are, for example, selling clothing, raising chickens, selling vegetables, and selling groceries, and others offer services such as transportation and cellular phone calls.

The members in general appreciate the opportunity offered them and promise to make their various payments according to the established schedules. (The people who appear in the lower part of the photograph arrived late for the meeting of the communal bank).

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco in the department of Cusco, in the heart of the old city of the Incas. It is characterized by being a tourist zone because of its archaeological centers, its historic center, its landscapes, and its history, and for being an enchanting city in the southern region of the country. Cusco is also known for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and for one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and sugar

loans.name: Mom

texts.en:
Mom is 44 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. Mom has been a farmer since 1980, earning income around 1 USD  per day. Her husband has been a construction worker in Phnom Penh city since 2008, earning profit about 3 USD. Two of her children are workers in garment factories, earning income around 6 USD per day. Each month, she has to spend 30 USD on food, 5 USD on utility expenses, and about 30 USD on other expenses. 

Mom is requesting a loan of 800 USD to purchase cattle to resell. This loan will help her family to get more profit. In the future, she hopes she can open a grocery store in front of her house, build the toilet behind the house, and support her children to finish university.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to resell.

loans.name: Sokoeurn

texts.en:
Sokoeurn, 30, works in the local garment factory in the Takeo province. She is married with two small children, who are still living at home, and her husband works in construction. She typically makes about 2 USD each day and would like a loan to buy a motorbike for commuting to work. 

In order to purchase a new motorbike, she is asking for 700 USD.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for commuting to work.

loans.name: Nget

texts.en:
Nget, 43, is married with four children living at home in the Takeo province. She works as a recycler, typically making 3 USD each day, and her husband is a moto-taxi driver. Her husband typically makes about 2 USD each day. This couple also got support from two children who are garment factory workers, making 2 USD each per day. 

Nget would like a loan of 700 USD to purchase a trailer for her husband to attach to a motorbike. This trailer would allow her husband to transport more customers.

loans.use: to purchase a trailer for her husband to attach to a motorbike.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is 49 years old and has nine children. She is married and has 2 children who are in school.

Sonia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and medicine for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for 16 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Sonia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicine for her pigs.

loans.name: Beverly

texts.en:
Beverly is 56 years old and has 5 children. She is married and has 2 children who are in school.

Beverly is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and medicine for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Beverly would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicine for her pigs.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
This is Linda, She previously accessed a 50,000 PHP loan that she used to buy raw materials needed in coin bank production and other supplies for her business  Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan for her to buy raw materials needed in coin bank production and other supplies. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in a better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Linda dreams of being able to give all her children a good, high quality education through all her hard work on her business, and she also hopes to tap more customers in the future. She faithfully meets up with her fellowship co-members to share stories of her work every week, and also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for supplies and materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a furniture making business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF to buy materials for her furniture business.

Mary Jane has been in this business for 14 years. She earns more income from raising livestock.

Mary Jane has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for her furniture business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 46 years old and has 6 children. She is married and has 4 children who are in school.

Josephine is in the agricultural business raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her livestock.

Josephine has been raising livestock for 15 years now, and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her livestock.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 39 years old and married with three children.

Gina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy grocery items to sell like bread, soft drinks and other miscellaneous items.

Gina has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 5 years and also earns an income from clothing sales.

Gina aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell like bread, soft drinks, and other miscellaneus items.

loans.name: Wanjiku

texts.en: Wanjiku is a hardworking business lady.  She sells charcoal, does farming and runs a small grocery business.  She previously took a loan of 20, 000 KES, which she used to buy charcoal for resale.  She made good sales and more profits. She has requested another loan of 40,000 KES to add stock of cereals, vegetables and fruits to her grocery store

loans.use: To add to her stock of cereals, vegetables and fruits in her grocery store.

loans.name: Srey

texts.en:
Srey is 48 years old and a widowed mother. She is a rice grower at the village of Baray district, Kompong Tom province. Aside from rice husbandry, Srey serves breakfast to local people for additional income. She sells pork porridge and Khmer noodle, earning an average of 20,000 KHR each day. She has been in this business for seven years. Srey has four children. Her oldest child is married and lives independently and the other three are still single and employed as garment workers in Phnom Penh.

Srey would like to acquire this loan to purchase an extra plot of farmland to expand her rice production. With the increase in income, she wants to reinvest back into her business and save for the future emergencies of the family.

loans.use: to purchase an extra plot of farmland to expand her rice production.

loans.name: Audy

texts.en: Audy is from Calaran, Calamba, Misamis Occidental. He is 53 years old. Audy is married and has 3 children. To make a living, Audy raises cows for sale. He has been in his business for 7 years and earns 7,000 a month for these activities. In 2010, Audy joined GDMPC. He is requesting a loan of 20,000 which will be used to purchase breeding livestock. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase breeding livestock

loans.name: Farogat

texts.en: As a married parent of four children, Farogat works hard to support her family. She has the ability to care for flowers. She loves flowers and has different kinds of flowers at home. If you enter her house, you will feel yourself in flower paradise. Now she is going to organize her own business with flowers. She studied the course 'To get a success' from a women's organization and got a certificate about her business skills. She is going to be busy with flowers that grow in pots. Her husband will help her with the business but his income is too small to support Farogat's business. That’s why you are the only ones who can help her. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money. In the future, Farogat hopes to improve her business in order to provide for the education of her children. She is asking for a loan of 2,000 TJS to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and flowerpots for organizing her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and flowerpots

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en: Lorena is married with two children. Lorena is 32 years old and lives in Macabibo, Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. To earn a living, she sells products such as lotions, perfume, and more. She has been operating this site for four years and earns 5,000 PHP each month. She has requested a loan for 6,000 PHP from GDMPC to obtain more products to sell such as soap, lipstick, perfume and more. Lorena joined GDMPC in 2011. In the future, Lorena hopes to be more progressive in this venture and would like to be able to expand the facility and product offerings to attract more customers.

loans.use: to obtain more products to sell such as soap, lipstick, perfume and more

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
